trans-unit.source: The EFS file systems can be imported using the id, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 id 导入EFS文件系统，例如

trans-unit.source: The EFS mount targets can be imported using the id, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 id 导入EFS挂载目标，例如

trans-unit.source: The EKS service does not currently provide managed resources for running worker nodes. Here we will create a few operator managed resources so that Kubernetes can properly manage other AWS services, networking access, and finally a configuration that allows automatic scaling of worker nodes.
trans-unit.target: EKS服务目前不提供运行工人节点的管理资源。在这里,我们将创建一些运营商管理资源,以便Kubernetes可以正确管理其他AWS服务、网络访问,最后是允许自动缩放工人节点的配置。

trans-unit.source: The EKS service does not provide a cluster-level API parameter or resource to automatically configure the underlying Kubernetes cluster to allow worker nodes to join the cluster via AWS IAM role authentication.
trans-unit.target: EKS服务没有提供群集级API参数或资源来自动配置底层Kubernetes群集,以允许工人节点通过AWS IAM角色认证加入群集。

trans-unit.source: The Extending Terraform section contains content for users who wish to extend Terraform. The intended audience is anyone wanting to add or edit source code (“developers”) for either Terraform itself or a Terraform Plugin. The content assumes you have basic operating knowledge or experience using Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 扩展Terraform部分包含希望扩展Terraform的用户的内容。目标受众是希望为Terraform本身或Terraform插件添加或编辑源代码的任何人（“开发人员”）。内容假定您具有使用Terraform的基本操作知识或经验。

trans-unit.source: The Fastly provider is used to interact with the content delivery network (CDN) provided by Fastly.
trans-unit.target: Fastly提供商用于与Fastly提供的内容传输网络(CDN)进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The Fastly provider offers an API key based method of providing credentials for authentication. The following methods are supported, in this order, and explained below:
trans-unit.target: Fastly提供商提供了一种基于API密钥的方法,为认证提供凭证。按顺序支持以下方法,并在下面进行解释。

trans-unit.source: The FlexibleEngine provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by FlexibleEngine. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: FlexibleEngine提供者用于与FlexibleEngine支持的许多资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The GitHub provider is used to interact with GitHub organization resources.
trans-unit.target: GitHub提供者用于与GitHub组织资源交互。

trans-unit.source: The GitLab provider is used to interact with GitLab group or user resources.
trans-unit.target: GitLab提供者用于与GitLab组或用户资源进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The GoDoc for helper/schema can be found here. This is API-level documentation but will be extremely important for you going forward.
trans-unit.target: 可以在此处找到用于 helper/schema 的GoDoc 。这是API级别的文档，但对您而言非常重要。

trans-unit.source: The Google Cloud provider is used to interact with Google Cloud services. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Google Cloud提供程序用于与Google Cloud服务进行交互。在使用提供者之前，需要为其配置适当的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The Google Cloud storage signed URL data source generates a signed URL for a given storage object. Signed URLs provide a way to give time-limited read or write access to anyone in possession of the URL, regardless of whether they have a Google account.
trans-unit.target: Google 云存储签名 URL 数据源为给定存储对象生成签名 URL。签名 URL 提供了一种方式,可让拥有 URL 的任何人都能获得有时间限制的读或写访问权限,无论他们是否拥有 Google 帐户。

trans-unit.source: The Google Compute Engine Instance Group Manager API creates and manages pools of homogeneous Compute Engine virtual machine instances from a common instance template. For more information, see the official documentation and API
trans-unit.target: Google Compute Engine实例组管理器API通过通用实例模板创建和管理同类Compute Engine虚拟机实例的池。有关更多信息，请参见官方文档和API。

trans-unit.source: The Google Compute Engine Regional Instance Group Manager API creates and manages pools of homogeneous Compute Engine virtual machine instances from a common instance template. For more information, see the official documentation and API
trans-unit.target: Google Compute Engine区域实例组管理器API通过通用实例模板创建和管理同类Compute Engine虚拟机实例的池。有关更多信息，请参见官方文档和API。

trans-unit.source: The Grafana provider configures data sources and dashboards in Grafana, which is a web application for creating, viewing and sharing metrics dashboards.
trans-unit.target: Grafana提供程序在Grafana（用于创建，查看和共享指标仪表板的Web应用程序）中配置数据源和仪表板。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP provider is a utility provider for interacting with generic HTTP servers as part of a Terraform configuration.
trans-unit.target: HTTP提供者是一个实用的提供者,用于与通用HTTP服务器交互,作为Terraform配置的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The Heroku provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Heroku. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Heroku提供者用于与Heroku支持的资源进行交互。提供者在使用前需要配置适当的凭证。

trans-unit.source: The Hetzner Cloud (hcloud) provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Hetzner Cloud. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Hetzner云(hcloud)提供商用于与Hetzner云支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供商之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The IAM Account Alias data source allows access to the account alias for the effective account in which Terraform is working.
trans-unit.target: 通过IAM账户别名数据源,可以访问Terraform工作的有效账户的账户别名。

trans-unit.source: The IAM policy document format allows context variables to be interpolated into various strings within a statement. The native IAM policy document format uses ${...}-style syntax that is in conflict with Terraform's interpolation syntax, so this data source instead uses &{...} syntax for interpolations that should be processed by AWS rather than by Terraform.
trans-unit.target: IAM策略文档格式允许将上下文变量内插到语句中的各种字符串中。本地IAM策略文档格式使用与Terraform插值语法冲突的 ${...} 样式语法，因此此数据源将 &{...} 语法用于应由AWS而非Terraform处理的插值。

trans-unit.source: The Icinga2 provider is used to configure hosts to be monitored by Icinga2 servers. The provider needs to be configured with the API URL of the Icinga2 server and credentials for an API user with the appropriate permissions.
trans-unit.target: Icinga2提供程序用于配置要由Icinga2服务器监视的主机。需要使用Icinga2服务器的API URL和具有适当权限的API用户的凭据来配置提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The Ignition provider is used to generate Ignition configuration files. Ignition is the provisioning utility used by CoreOS Linux.
trans-unit.target: Ignition提供程序用于生成Ignition配置文件。Ignition是CoreOS Linux 使用的置备实用程序。

trans-unit.source: The Images data source list image resource list contains private images of the user and images of system resources provided by Alicloud, as well as other public images and those available on the image market.
trans-unit.target: 图片数据源列表图片资源列表中包含了用户的私有图片和Alicloud提供的系统资源图片,以及其他公共图片和图片市场上的图片。

trans-unit.source: The InfluxDB provider allows Terraform to create Databases in InfluxDB. InfluxDB is a database server optimized for time-series data.
trans-unit.target: InfluxDB提供程序允许Terraform在InfluxDB中创建数据库。InfluxDB是针对时间序列数据优化的数据库服务器。

trans-unit.source: The Instance Types data source list the ecs_instance_types of Alicloud.
trans-unit.target: Instance Types数据源列出了Alicloud的ecs_instance_types。

trans-unit.source: The Instances data source list ECS instance resource accoring to its ID, name regex, image id, status and other fields.
trans-unit.target: 实例数据源根据其ID、名称、图像ID、状态等字段列出ECS实例资源。

trans-unit.source: The KMS ciphertext data source allows you to encrypt plaintext into ciphertext by using an AWS KMS customer master key.
trans-unit.target: KMS密文数据源允许您使用AWS KMS客户主密钥将明文加密为密文。

trans-unit.source: The KMS keys data source provides a list of Alicloud KMS keys in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: KMS密钥数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud KMS密钥列表。

trans-unit.source: The KMS secret data source allows you to use data encrypted with the AWS KMS service within your resource definitions.
trans-unit.target: KMS秘密数据源允许您在您的资源定义中使用与AWS KMS服务加密的数据。

trans-unit.source: The Key Pairs data source provides a list of Alicloud Key Pairs in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Key Pairs数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Key Pairs列表。

trans-unit.source: The Kubernetes (K8S) provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Kubernetes. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Kubernetes (K8S)提供者用于与Kubernetes支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Librato provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Librato. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Librato提供者用于与Librato支持的资源进行交互。在使用之前,提供者需要用适当的凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Local provider is used to manage local resources, such as files.
trans-unit.target: 本地提供者用于管理本地资源,如文件。

trans-unit.source: The Logentries provider is used to manage Logentries logs and log sets. Logentries provides live log management and analytics. The provider needs to be configured with a Logentries account key before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Logentries提供商用于管理Logentries日志和日志集。Logentries 提供实时日志管理和分析。在使用该提供商之前,需要用 Logentries 账户密钥进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The LogicMonitor provider is used to interact with the resources supported by LogicMonitor. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: LogicMonitor 提供者用于与 LogicMonitor 支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要使用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Mailgun provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Mailgun. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Mailgun 提供者用于与 Mailgun 支持的资源交互。在使用之前,需要用适当的凭证配置提供者。

trans-unit.source: The Managed Object Browser (MOB) allows one to browse the entire vSphere inventory as it's presented to the API. It's normally accessed via https://VSPHERE_SERVER/mob. For more information, see here.
trans-unit.target: 托管对象浏览器（MOB）允许浏览提供给API的整个vSphere清单。通常可以通过 https://VSPHERE_SERVER/mob 进行访问。有关更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: The NS1 provider exposes resources to interact with the NS1 REST API. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: NS1 提供者公开了与 NS1 REST API 交互的资源。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The NSX Terraform Provider
trans-unit.target: NSX Terraform供应商

trans-unit.source: The NSX Terraform provider can be used to manage logical networking and security constructs in NSX. This includes logical switching, routing and firewall.
trans-unit.target: NSX Terraform提供商可用于管理NSX中的逻辑网络和安全构造。这包括逻辑交换、路由和防火墙。

trans-unit.source: The NSX Terraform provider gives the NSX administrator a way to automate NSX to provide virtualized networking and security services using both ESXi and KVM based hypervisor hosts as well as container networking and security.
trans-unit.target: NSX Terraform提供商为NSX管理员提供了一种方法,使NSX能够自动化地使用基于ESXi和KVM的管理程序主机提供虚拟化网络和安全服务,以及容器网络和安全。

trans-unit.source: The NSX provider offers several ways to authenticate to the NSX manager. Credentials can be provided statically or provided as environment variables. In addition, client certificates can be used for authentication. For authentication with certificates Terraform will require a certificate file and private key file in PEM format. To use client certificates the client certificate needs to be registered with NSX-T manager prior to invoking Terraform.
trans-unit.target: NSX 提供商提供了几种方法来验证到 NSX 管理器的身份。可以静态地提供凭证,也可以作为环境变量提供。此外,客户端证书也可用于身份验证。对于使用证书进行身份验证,Terraform需要PEM格式的证书文件和私钥文件。要使用客户端证书,需要在调用Terraform之前,在NSX-T管理器中注册客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: The OVH provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by OVH. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: OVH提供者用于与OVH支持的许多资源进行交互。提供者在使用之前需要用适当的凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The OpenStack provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by OpenStack. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: OpenStack提供者用于与OpenStack支持的许多资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The OpenTelekomCloud provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by OpenTelekomCloud. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: OpenTelekomCloud提供商用于与OpenTelekomCloud支持的众多资源进行交互。提供者在使用之前需要用适当的凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The OpsGenie provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by OpsGenie. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: OpsGenie 提供者用于与 OpsGenie 支持的许多资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Classic provider (formerly know as the Oracle Public Cloud provider) is used to interact with the many resources supported by the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Classic and Oracle Cloud at Customer infrastructure services. The provider needs to be configured with credentials for the Oracle Cloud Account.
trans-unit.target: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Classic提供程序（以前称为Oracle Public Cloud提供程序）用于在客户基础结构服务处与Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Classic和Oracle Cloud支持的许多资源进行交互。需要为提供程序配置Oracle Cloud Account的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The Oracle Cloud Platform (Oracle PaaS) provider is used to interact with resources supported by the Oracle Cloud Platform services. The provider needs to be configured with credentials for the Oracle Cloud Account.
trans-unit.target: Oracle Cloud Platform（Oracle PaaS）提供程序用于与Oracle Cloud Platform服务支持的资源进行交互。需要为提供程序配置Oracle Cloud Account的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The Packet provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Packet. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Packet 提供者用于与 Packet 支持的资源进行交互。在使用之前,需要用适当的凭证配置提供者。

trans-unit.source: The PostgreSQL provider gives the ability to deploy and configure resources in a PostgreSQL server.
trans-unit.target: PostgreSQL提供者提供了在PostgreSQL服务器中部署和配置资源的能力。

trans-unit.source: The PowerDNS provider is used manipulate DNS records supported by PowerDNS server. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used. It supports both the legacy API and the new version 1 API, however resources may need to be configured differently.
trans-unit.target: PowerDNS提供程序用于处理PowerDNS服务器支持的DNS记录。在使用提供者之前，需要为其配置适当的凭据。它同时支持旧版API和新版本1 API，但是可能需要对资源进行不同的配置。

trans-unit.source: The Profile Setting is implicitly chosen based on what params are configured for the security rule. If you want a Profile Setting of Group, then the group param should be set to the desired Group Profile. If you want a Profile Setting of Profiles, then you will need to specify one or more of the following params:
trans-unit.target: 根据为安全规则配置的参数隐式选择配置文件设置。如果你想要的配置文件设置 Group ，然后将 group PARAM应设置为所需的组配置文件。如果要使用 Profiles 的设置，则需要指定以下一个或多个参数：

trans-unit.source: The ProfitBricks provider gives the ability to deploy and configure resources using the ProfitBricks Cloud API.
trans-unit.target: ProfitBricks提供商提供了使用ProfitBricks Cloud API部署和配置资源的能力。

trans-unit.source: The Provider Schema
trans-unit.target: 提供者模式

trans-unit.source: The RabbitMQ management plugin must be enabled to use this provider. You can enable the plugin by doing something similar to:
trans-unit.target: 必须启用 RabbitMQ 管理插件才能使用此提供商。您可以通过执行类似的操作来启用该插件。

trans-unit.source: The Ram Account Alias data source provides an alias for the Alicloud account.
trans-unit.target: Ram账户别名数据源提供了Alicloud账户的别名。

trans-unit.source: The Ram Groups data source provides a list of Alicloud Ram Groups in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Ram Groups数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中Alicloud Ram Groups的列表。

trans-unit.source: The Ram Policies data source provides a list of Alicloud Ram Policies in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Ram策略数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Ram策略列表。

trans-unit.source: The Ram Roles data source provides a list of Alicloud Ram Roles in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Ram Roles数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Ram Roles列表。

trans-unit.source: The Ram Users data source provides a list of Alicloud Ram Users in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: Ram Users数据源根据指定的过滤器提供Alicloud账户中的Alicloud Ram用户列表。

trans-unit.source: The Rancher provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Rancher. The provider needs to be configured with the URL of the Rancher server at minimum and API credentials if access control is enabled on the server.
trans-unit.target: Rancher提供者用于与Rancher支持的资源进行交互。提供者至少需要配置Rancher服务器的URL,如果服务器上启用了访问控制,则需要配置API凭证。

trans-unit.source: The Regions data source allows access to the list of Alicloud Regions.
trans-unit.target: 区域数据源允许访问Alicloud区域列表。

trans-unit.source: The Replication Controller allows you to replicate pods. This is useful for maintaining overall availability and scalability of your application exposed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 复制控制器允许您复制豆荚。这对于维护您暴露在用户面前的应用程序的整体可用性和可扩展性非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The Rundeck provider allows Terraform to create and configure Projects, Jobs and Keys in Rundeck. Rundeck is a tool for runbook automation and execution of arbitrary management tasks, allowing operators to avoid logging in to individual machines directly via SSH.
trans-unit.target: 该Rundeck提供商允许Terraform创建和配置项目，乔布斯和键，Rundeck。Rundeck是用于运行手册自动化和执行任意管理任务的工具，使操作员可以避免直接通过SSH登录到各个计算机。

trans-unit.source: The Runscope provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Runscope. The provider needs to be configured with an access token before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Runscope 提供者用于与 Runscope 支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要用访问令牌进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The S3 backend can be used in a number of different ways that make different tradeoffs between convenience, security, and isolation in such an organization. This section describes one such approach that aims to find a good compromise between these tradeoffs, allowing use of Terraform's workspaces feature to switch conveniently between multiple isolated deployments of the same configuration.
trans-unit.target: S3后端可以以多种不同方式使用，从而在此类组织中的便利性，安全性和隔离性之间做出不同的权衡。本节介绍了一种这样的方法，其目的是在这些折衷之间找到一个良好的折衷，从而允许使用Terraform的工作区功能在同一配置的多个独立部署之间方便地进行切换。

trans-unit.source: The S3 object data source allows access to the metadata and optionally (see below) content of an object stored inside S3 bucket.
trans-unit.target: S3对象数据源允许访问存储在S3存储桶中的对象的元数据和可选的内容（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: The Scaleway provider is used to manage Scaleway resources.
trans-unit.target: Scaleway提供商用于管理Scaleway资源。

trans-unit.source: The Schema attribute Type defines what kind of values users can provide in their configuration for this element. Here we define the available schema types supported. See Schema Behaviors for more information on configuring element behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 架构属性 Type 定义用户可以在其配置中为此元素提供哪些类型的值。在这里，我们定义了支持的可用模式类型。有关配置元素行为的更多信息，请参见模式行为。

trans-unit.source: The Schema package is a high-level framework for easily writing Plugins for Terraform. Providers (with Resources and/or Data Sources), and Provisioners are all defined in terms of the Schema package, which includes builtin types and methods for developers to use when writing plugins.
trans-unit.target: Schema包是一个高级框架,可以方便地编写Terraform的插件。提供者(包括资源和/或数据源)和供应者都是在Schema包中定义的,其中包括内置的类型和方法,供开发人员在编写插件时使用。

trans-unit.source: The Security Groups data source provides a list of Security Groups in an Alicloud account according to the specified filters.
trans-unit.target: 安全组数据源根据指定的过滤器提供一个Alicloud账户中的安全组列表。

trans-unit.source: The Server Load Balancer instance attached with VPC-type ECS instances cannot be attached to the scaling group.
trans-unit.target: 与VPC型ECS实例相连接的服务器负载均衡器实例不能连接到缩放组。

trans-unit.source: The Server Load Balancer instance must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 必须启用服务器负载均衡器实例。

trans-unit.source: The Service resource requires a domain name that is correctly set up to direct traffic to the Fastly service. See Fastly's guide on Adding CNAME Records on their documentation site for guidance.
trans-unit.target: 服务资源需要正确设置的域名，才能将流量定向到Fastly服务。有关指导，请参见其文档站点上的快速添加CNAME记录指南。

trans-unit.source: The SoftLayer provider is used to manage SoftLayer resources.
trans-unit.target: SoftLayer提供者用于管理SoftLayer资源。

trans-unit.source: The Spotinst provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Spotinst. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Spotinst提供者用于与Spotinst支持的资源进行交互。提供者在使用之前需要用适当的凭证进行配置.

trans-unit.source: The StatusCake provider allows Terraform to create and configure tests in StatusCake. StatusCake is a tool that helps to monitor the uptime of your service via a network of monitoring centers throughout the world
trans-unit.target: StatusCake提供程序允许Terraform在StatusCake中创建和配置测试。StatusCake是一种工具，可通过遍布全球的监控中心网络来监控您的服务的正常运行时间

trans-unit.source: The TLS provider provides utilities for working with Transport Layer Security keys and certificates. It provides resources that allow private keys, certificates and certficate requests to be created as part of a Terraform deployment.
trans-unit.target: TLS提供程序提供了用于处理传输层安全性密钥和证书的实用程序。它提供的资源允许将私钥，证书和认证请求创建为Terraform部署的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The TelefonicaOpenCloud provider is used to interact with the many resources supported by TelefonicaOpenCloud. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: TelefonicaOpenCloud提供商用于与TelefonicaOpenCloud支持的众多资源进行交互。在使用该提供商之前,需要用适当的凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform CLI commands interact with the HashiCorp service Checkpoint to check for the availability of new versions and for critical security bulletins about the current version.
trans-unit.target: Terraform CLI命令与HashiCorp服务检查点进行交互，以检查新版本的可用性以及有关当前版本的重要安全公告。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform Registry is integrated directly into Terraform to make consuming modules easy. See the usage information.
trans-unit.target: Terraform Registry直接集成到Terraform中，以简化使用模块。请参阅用法信息。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform Registry is integrated directly into Terraform. This makes it easy to reference any module in the registry. The syntax for referencing a registry module is <NAMESPACE>/<NAME>/<PROVIDER>. For example: hashicorp/consul/aws.
trans-unit.target: Terraform注册表直接集成到Terraform中。这使引用注册表中的任何模块变得容易。引用注册表模块的语法为 <NAMESPACE>/<NAME>/<PROVIDER> 。例如： hashicorp/consul/aws 。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform Registry uses tags to detect releases.
trans-unit.target: Terraform Registry使用标签来检测发布。

trans-unit.source: The Terraform configuration required for the test is applied. This is responsible for configuring the resource under test, and any dependencies it may have. For example, to test the azurerm_public_ip resource, an azurerm_resource_group is required. This results in configuration which looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 应用测试所需的Terraform配置。这负责配置被测资源及其可能具有的任何依赖关系。例如，要测试 azurerm_public_ip 资源，需要 azurerm_resource_group 。这导致配置如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The Terraform state subcommands all work with remote state just as if it was local state. Reads and writes may take longer than normal as each read and each write do a full network roundtrip. Otherwise, backups are still written to disk and the CLI usage is the same as if it were local state.
trans-unit.target: Terraform状态子命令对远程状态的工作就像对本地状态一样。读和写的时间可能比正常情况下要长,因为每次读和每次写都要做一个完整的网络往返。否则,备份还是会写入磁盘,CLI的用法和本地状态一样。

trans-unit.source: The Traffic Manager is created with the location global.
trans-unit.target: 创建的流量管理器的位置为 global 。

trans-unit.source: The Triton provider is used to interact with resources in Joyent's Triton cloud. It is compatible with both public- and on-premise installations of Triton. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: Triton提供商用于与Joyent的Triton云中的资源进行交互。它与 Triton 的公共和内部安装兼容。在使用该提供商之前,需要用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The URLs are computed entirely offline - as long as the project exists, they will be valid, but this data source does not contact Google Container Registry (GCR) at any point.
trans-unit.target: 这些URLs完全是离线计算的--只要项目存在,它们就会有效,但这个数据源在任何时候都不会联系Google Container Registry(GCR)。

trans-unit.source: The URLs for Git repositories support the following query parameters:
trans-unit.target: Git 仓库的 URL 支持以下查询参数。

trans-unit.source: The UltraDNS provider is used to interact with the resources supported by UltraDNS. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: UltraDNS提供者用于与UltraDNS支持的资源进行交互。在使用之前,需要用适当的凭证配置提供者。

trans-unit.source: The VMware vCloud Director provider is used to interact with the resources supported by VMware vCloud Director. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: VMware vCloud Director 提供者用于与 VMware vCloud Director 支持的资源进行交互。在使用该提供商之前,需要使用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The VMware vSphere provider gives Terraform the ability to work with VMware vSphere Products, notably vCenter Server and ESXi. This provider can be used to manage many aspects of a VMware vSphere environment, including virtual machines, standard and distributed networks, datastores, and more.
trans-unit.target: VMware vSphere提供程序使Terraform能够与VMware vSphere产品（尤其是vCenter Server和ESXi）一起使用。该提供程序可用于管理VMware vSphere环境的许多方面，包括虚拟机，标准和分布式网络，数据存储等。

trans-unit.source: The VPC Endpoint Service data source details about a specific service that can be specified when creating a VPC endpoint within the region configured in the provider.
trans-unit.target: VPC端点服务数据源详细介绍了在提供商中配置的区域内创建VPC端点时可以指定的特定服务。

trans-unit.source: The VPC Endpoint data source provides details about a specific VPC endpoint.
trans-unit.target: VPC端点数据源提供有关特定VPC端点的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The VPC Peering Connection data source provides details about a specific VPC peering connection.
trans-unit.target: VPC对等连接数据源提供有关特定VPC对等连接的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The VPCs data source lists a number of VPCs resource information owned by an Alicloud account.
trans-unit.target: VPCs数据源列出了一个Alicloud账户拥有的一些VPCs资源信息。

trans-unit.source: The VPN Gateway data source provides details about a specific VPN gateway.
trans-unit.target: VPN网关数据源提供了有关特定VPN网关的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Vault provider allows Terraform to read from, write to, and configure Hashicorp Vault.
trans-unit.target: Vault提供程序允许Terraform读取，写入和配置Hashicorp Vault。

trans-unit.source: The Virtual sunbet data source lists a list of vswitches resource information owned by an Alicloud account, and each vswitch including its basic attribution, VPC ID and containing ECS instance IDs.
trans-unit.target: 虚拟sunbet数据源列出了一个Alicloud账户所拥有的vswitch资源信息列表,每个vswitch包括其基本归属、VPC ID和包含ECS实例ID。

trans-unit.source: The Zones data source allows access to the list of Alicloud Zones which can be accessed by an Alicloud account within the region configured in the provider.
trans-unit.target: Zones数据源允许访问Alicloud Zones列表,Alicloud账户可以在提供商配置的区域内访问这些Zones。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the DHCP relay profile named dr_profile with the NSX id UUID.

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the DHCP relay service named dr_service with the NSX id UUID.

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the IP protocol based networking and security service named ns_service_ip with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 ns_service_ip 的基于IP协议的网络服务和安全性服务，其NSX ID为 UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the IP set named ip_set1 with the NSX id UUID.

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the NAT rule named rule1 with the number id nat-rule-num that belongs to the tier 1 logical router with the NSX id logical-router-uuid.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名称为 rule1 nat-rule-num 的NAT规则，该规则属于具有NSX id logical-router-uuid 的第1层逻辑路由器。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the algorithm based networking and security service named ns_service_alg with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令导入名为 ns_service_alg 的基于算法的网络和安全服务，其NSX ID为 UUID 。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the layer 4 port based networking and security service named ns_service_l4 with the NSX id UUID.

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the logical router link port on the tier 1 router named link_port_tier1 with the NSX id UUID.
trans-unit.target: 上面的命令使用NSX ID UUID link_port_tier1 名为link_port_tier1的第1层路由器上的逻辑路由器链接端口。

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the logical tier 1 router named tier1_router with the NSX id UUID.

trans-unit.source: The above command imports the static route named static_route with the number static-route-num that belongs to the tier 1 logical router with the NSX id logical-router-uuid.

trans-unit.target: 上面的示例将使用来自公共注册表的AWS的Consul模块。

trans-unit.source: The above import is considered a "simple import": one resource is imported into the state file. An import may also result in a "complex import" where multiple resources are imported. For example, an AWS security group imports an aws_security_group but also one aws_security_group_rule for each rule.
trans-unit.target: 上面的导入被认为是“简单导入”：将一种资源导入状态文件。导入还可能导致导入多个资源的“复杂导入”。例如，一个AWS安全组 aws_security_group_rule 为每个规则导入一个 aws_security_group ,但也会导入一个aws_security_group_rule。

trans-unit.source: The alert notification resource allows an alert notification channel to be created on a Grafana server.
trans-unit.target: 警报通知资源允许在Grafana服务器上创建一个警报通知通道。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory to allocate in megabytes.
trans-unit.target: 要分配的内存量,单位为兆字节。

trans-unit.source: The amount of parallelism is limited using a semaphore to prevent too many concurrent operations from overwhelming the resources of the machine running Terraform. By default, up to 10 nodes in the graph will be processed concurrently. This number can be set using the -parallelism flag on the plan, apply, and destroy commands.
trans-unit.target: 使用信号量限制并行性的数量，以防止过多的并发操作淹没运行Terraform的计算机的资源。默认情况下，图形中最多可同时处理10个节点。可以使用plan，apply和destroy命令上的 -parallelism 标志来设置此数字。

trans-unit.source: The arguments of this data source act as filters for querying the available Hosted Zone. You have to use zone_id or name, not both of them. The given filter must match exactly one Hosted Zone. If you use name field for private Hosted Zone, you need to add private_zone field to true
trans-unit.target: 该数据源的参数充当用于查询可用托管区域的筛选器。您必须使用 zone_id 或 name ，而不能同时使用它们。给定的过滤器必须完全匹配一个托管区域。如果您将 name 字段用于私有托管区域，则需要将 private_zone 字段添加为 true

trans-unit.target: 这个数据源的参数作为过滤器,用于查询可用的计费账户。给定的过滤器必须正好匹配一个账单账户,其数据将作为属性导出。支持以下参数。

trans-unit.source: The arguments of this data source act as filters for querying the available prefix lists. The given filters must match exactly one prefix list whose data will be exported as attributes.
trans-unit.target: 这个数据源的参数作为查询可用前缀列表的过滤器。给定的过滤器必须正好匹配一个前缀列表,其数据将作为属性导出。

trans-unit.source: The arguments of this data source act as filters for querying the available regions. The given filters must match exactly one region whose data will be exported as attributes.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源的参数作为查询可用区域的过滤器。给定的过滤器必须正好匹配一个区域,其数据将作为属性导出。

trans-unit.source: The arguments of this data source act as filters for querying the available security group in the current region. The given filters must match exactly one security group whose data will be exported as attributes.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源的参数可作为查询当前区域内可用安全组的过滤器。给定的过滤器必须正好匹配一个安全组,其数据将作为属性导出。

trans-unit.source: The arguments of this data source act as filters for querying the available subnets in the current region. The given filters must match exactly one subnet whose data will be exported as attributes.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源的参数作为过滤器,用于查询当前区域内的可用子网。给定的过滤器必须正好匹配一个子网,其数据将作为属性导出。

trans-unit.source: The arguments used in a module block, such as the servers parameter above, correspond to variables within the module itself. You can therefore discover all the available variables for a module by inspecting the source of it.
trans-unit.target: module 块中使用的参数（例如上面的 servers 参数）对应于模块本身内的变量。因此，您可以通过检查源来发现模块的所有可用变量。

trans-unit.source: The assigned principal_id and tenant_id can be retrieved after the App Service has been created. More details are available below.
trans-unit.target: 创建App Service后，可以检索分配的 principal_id 和 tenant_id 。下面提供了更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The assigned principal_id and tenant_id can be retrieved after the identity type has been set to SystemAssigned and Storage Account has been created. More details are available below.
trans-unit.target: 在将标识 type 设置为 SystemAssigned 并创建存储帐户后，可以检索分配的 principal_id 和 tenant_id 。下面提供了更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The attached ECS instances and the instance with active scaling configurations must have the same instance type.
trans-unit.target: 连接的ECS实例和具有活动缩放配置的实例必须具有相同的实例类型。

trans-unit.source: The attached ECS instances and the scaling group must have the same region and network type(Classic or VPC).
trans-unit.target: 连接的ECS实例和伸缩组必须具有相同的区域和网络类型（ Classic 或 VPC ）。

trans-unit.source: The attached ECS instances has not been attached to other scaling groups.
trans-unit.target: 附属的ECS实例没有附加到其他缩放组。

trans-unit.source: The attached ECS instances must in the running state.
trans-unit.target: 附加的ECS实例必须处于运行状态。

trans-unit.source: The attached ECS instances supports Subscription and Pay-As-You-Go payment methods.
trans-unit.target: 附带的ECS实例支持订阅和现收现付的支付方式。

trans-unit.source: The attributes are listed in alphabetical order (with the except of "id" which is always at the top). They are outputted in a way that is easy to parse on the command-line.
trans-unit.target: 属性是按字母顺序排列的(除了 "id "总是排在最前面)。它们的输出方式很容易在命令行中进行解析。

trans-unit.source: The automatic plugin installation behavior can be overridden by extracting the desired providers into a local directory and using the additional option -plugin-dir=PATH. When this option is specified, only the given directory is consulted, which prevents Terraform from making requests to the plugin repository or looking for plugins in other local directories. Passing an empty string to -plugin-dir removes any previously recorded paths.
trans-unit.target: 通过将所需的提供程序提取到本地目录中并使用附加选项 -plugin-dir=PATH ,可以覆盖自动插件安装行为。指定此选项后，仅查询给定目录，这将阻止Terraform向插件存储库发出请求或在其他本地目录中查找插件。将空字符串传递给 -plugin-dir 会删除以前记录的所有路径。

trans-unit.source: The automation level can be further tuned for each specific SDRS subsystem. Specifying an override will set the automation level for that part of Storage DRS to the respective level. Not specifying an override infers that you want to use the cluster default automation level.
trans-unit.target: 可针对每个特定 SDRS 子系统进一步调整自动化级别。指定覆盖将为存储 DRS 的该部分设置自动化级别到相应的级别。不指定覆盖意味着您要使用群集默认自动化级别。

trans-unit.source: The backends are separated in the left by standard and enhanced.
trans-unit.target: 后台在左边是由标准和增强型分开的。

trans-unit.source: The basic example below creates a virtual machine folder named terraform-test-folder in the default datacenter's VM hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: The behavior of any terraform destroy command can be previewed at any time with an equivalent terraform plan -destroy command.
trans-unit.target: 可以随时使用等效的 terraform plan -destroy 命令预览任何 terraform destroy 命令的行为。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of conversion in this direction (string to boolean) will not change in future Terraform versions. Therefore, using these string values rather than literal booleans is recommended when using input variables.
trans-unit.target: 在将来的Terraform版本中，此方向（字符串到布尔值）的转换行为将不会改变。因此，在使用输入变量时，建议使用这些字符串值而不是文字布尔值。

trans-unit.target: clc提供商用于与世纪互联云支持的众多资源进行交互。提供者在使用之前需要用账户凭证进行配置。

trans-unit.target: cloudscale.ch 提供者用于与 cloudscale.ch 支持的资源交互。在使用该提供者之前,需要使用适当的凭证对其进行配置。

trans-unit.source: The code within the binaries must adhere to certain interfaces. The network communication and RPC is handled automatically by higher-level Terraform libraries. The exact interface to implement is documented in its respective documentation section.
trans-unit.target: 二进制文件中的代码必须遵守一定的接口。网络通信和RPC由上层的Terraform库自动处理。具体要实现的接口在相应的文档部分有说明。

trans-unit.source: The command currently can only import one resource at a time. This means you can't yet point Terraform import to an entire collection of resources such as an AWS VPC and import all of it. This workflow will be improved in a future version of Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 该命令目前一次只能导入一个资源。这意味着你还不能将Terraform导入指向整个资源集合,比如AWS VPC,并将其全部导入。这个工作流程将在未来的Terraform版本中得到改进。

trans-unit.source: The command will list all existing workspaces. The current workspace is indicated using an asterisk (*) marker.

trans-unit.target: 该命令将显示状态文件中与给定地址匹配的单个资源的属性。

trans-unit.target: 条件可以是任何有效的插值语法,如变量访问、函数调用,甚至是其他条件。真值和假值也可以是任何有效的插值语法。由true和false侧返回的类型必须是相同的。

trans-unit.source: The configuration is placed in a single file whose location depends on the host operating system:

trans-unit.source: The configuration looks similar to the one below:

trans-unit.source: The configuration within the loaded files are appended to each other. This is in contrast to being merged. This means that two resources with the same name are not merged, and will instead cause a validation error. This is in contrast to overrides, which do merge.
trans-unit.target: 加载的文件中的配置会相互附加。这与被合并相反。这意味着两个名称相同的资源不会合并，而是会导致验证错误。这与覆盖合并的覆盖相反。

trans-unit.source: The content of the file must be valid UTF-8 due to Terraform's assumptions about string encoding. Files that do not contain UTF-8 text will have invalid UTF-8 sequences replaced with the Unicode replacement character.
trans-unit.target: 由于Terraform对字符串编码的假设,文件的内容必须是有效的UTF-8。不包含UTF-8文本的文件将用Unicode替换字符替换无效的UTF-8序列。

trans-unit.source: The contents of data will vary from each Block Storage service. You must have a good understanding of how the service is configured and how to make the appropriate final connection. However, if used correctly, this has the flexibility to be able to attach OpenStack Block Storage volumes to non-OpenStack resources.
trans-unit.target: data 内容将因每个块存储服务而异。您必须对如何配置服务以及如何进行适当的最终连接有很好的了解。但是，如果使用得当，它具有灵活性，能够将OpenStack块存储卷附加到非OpenStack资源。

trans-unit.source: The continuous_query resource allows a continuous query to be created on an InfluxDB server.
trans-unit.target: continuous_query资源允许在InfluxDB服务器上创建连续查询。

trans-unit.source: The conversion should be pretty straightforward and self-documented.
trans-unit.target: 转换应该是很直接的,而且是自我记录的。

trans-unit.target: 当然,创建新证书可能会导致依赖的资源被更新或替换,这取决于适用于这些资源的生命周期规则。

trans-unit.source: The credentials may also be provided to endpoints declared in the discovery document, depending on the requirements of the service in question.
trans-unit.target: 根据相关服务的要求,还可以将凭证提供给发现文档中声明的端点。

trans-unit.source: The credentials provided in .tf file will override credentials in the environment variables.
trans-unit.target: .tf 文件中提供的凭据将覆盖环境变量中的凭据。

trans-unit.target: 当前执行的Terraform导入只能将资源导入到状态中。它不会生成配置。Terraform的未来版本也将生成配置。

trans-unit.source: The current list of HashiCorp Providers is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 目前HashiCorp供应商名单如下。

trans-unit.target: 此块中当前仅允许的配置是 required_version 和 backend 。

trans-unit.source: The dashboard resource allows a dashboard to be created on a Grafana server.
trans-unit.target: 仪表盘资源允许在Grafana服务器上创建仪表盘。

trans-unit.source: The data centers data source can be used to search for and return an existing Virtual Data Center. You can provide a string for the name and location parameters which will be compared with provisioned Virtual Data Centers. If a single match is found, it will be returned. If your search results in multiple matches, an error will be generated. When this happens, please refine your search string so that it is specific enough to return only one result.
trans-unit.target: 数据中心数据源可用于搜索并返回现有的虚拟数据中心。您可以为名称和位置参数提供一个字符串,该字符串将与已供应的虚拟数据中心进行比较。如果找到单个匹配项,则会返回。如果您的搜索结果有多个匹配项,将生成一个错误。当发生这种情况时,请完善您的搜索字符串,使其足够具体,以便只返回一个结果。

trans-unit.source: The data directory is used to retain data that must persist from one command to the next, so it's important to have this variable set consistently throughout all of the Terraform workflow commands (starting with terraform init) or else Terraform may be unable to find providers, modules, and other artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 数据目录用于保留必须从一个命令到下一个命令保留的数据，因此在所有Terraform工作流程命令（以 terraform init 开头）中始终设置此变量很重要，否则Terraform可能找不到提供者，模块和其他工件。

trans-unit.source: The data source resource allows a data source to be created on a Grafana server.
trans-unit.target: 数据源资源允许在Grafana服务器上创建数据源。

trans-unit.source: The database resource allows a database to be created on an InfluxDB server.
trans-unit.target: 数据库资源允许在InfluxDB服务器上创建数据库。

trans-unit.target: 在上述例子中的数据源应被称为 network_id 内部 network_interface 为第 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源。

trans-unit.source: The default timeouts values are:
trans-unit.target: 默认 timeouts 值为：

trans-unit.source: The default deadline for the EC2 metadata API endpoint is 100 milliseconds, which can be overidden by setting the AWS_METADATA_TIMEOUT environment variable. The variable expects a positive golang Time.Duration string, which is a sequence of decimal numbers and a unit suffix; valid suffixes are ns (nanoseconds), us (microseconds), ms (milliseconds), s (seconds), m (minutes), and h (hours). Examples of valid inputs: 100ms, 250ms, 1s, 2.5s, 2.5m, 1m30s.
trans-unit.target: EC2元数据API端点的默认截止日期为100毫秒，可以通过设置 AWS_METADATA_TIMEOUT 环境变量来忽略。该变量需要一个正的golang Time.Duration字符串，该字符串是一个十进制数字和一个单位后缀的序列；有效后缀是 ns （纳秒）， us （微秒）， ms （毫秒）， s （秒）， m （分钟）和 h （小时）。有效输入的示例： 100ms ， 250ms ， 1s ， 2.5s ， 2.5m ， 1m30s 。

trans-unit.source: The default value is multi-regional location US. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为多区域位置 US 。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: The default value of an input variable must be a literal value, containing no interpolation expressions. To assign a name to an expression so that it may be re-used within a module, use Local Values instead.
trans-unit.target: 输入变量的默认值必须是文字值，不包含插值表达式。要将名称分配给表达式以便可以在模块中重复使用，请改用“ 本地值”。

trans-unit.source: The default weight of an ECS instance attached to the Server Load Balancer instance is 50.
trans-unit.target: 连接到服务器负载均衡器实例的ECS实例的默认权重为50。

trans-unit.source: The destroy function should always handle the case where the resource might already be destroyed (manually, for example). If the resource is already destroyed, this should not return an error. This allows Terraform users to manually delete resources without breaking Terraform. Recompile and reinitialize the Provider:
trans-unit.target: destroy函数应该总是处理资源可能已经被销毁的情况(例如,手动销毁)。如果资源已经被销毁,则不应该返回一个错误。这允许Terraform用户在不破坏Terraform的情况下手动删除资源。重新编译并重新初始化Provider。

trans-unit.source: The discovery protocol's purpose is to map from a user-provided hostname to the base URL of a particular service. Each host can provide different combinations of services -- or no services at all! -- and so the discovery protocol has a secondary purpose of allowing Terraform to identify which services are valid for a given hostname.
trans-unit.target: 发现协议的目的是将用户提供的主机名映射到特定服务的基本URL。每个主机可以提供不同的服务组合-或根本不提供任何服务！-这样的发现协议有允许Terraform识别的次要目的，其服务是有效的给定主机名。

trans-unit.source: The documentation of each feature of this provider, accessible via the navigation, gives examples of situations where these constructs may prove useful.
trans-unit.target: 该提供者的每个功能的文档都可以通过导航访问,并给出了这些构造可能证明有用的情况的例子。

trans-unit.source: The downsides of JSON are less human readability and the lack of comments. Otherwise, the two are completely interoperable.
trans-unit.target: JSON的缺点是人的可读性较差,缺乏注释。除此之外,两者是完全可以互通的。

trans-unit.source: The easiest source is the local file path. For maximum portability, this should be a relative file path into a subdirectory. This allows you to organize your Terraform configuration into modules within one repository, for example:
trans-unit.target: 最简单的来源是本地文件路径。为了最大限度地提高可移植性,这应该是一个相对的文件路径,进入一个子目录。例如,这允许你将Terraform配置组织成一个仓库中的模块。

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to configure the provider is by creating/generating a config in a default location (~/.kube/config). That allows you to leave the provider block completely empty.
trans-unit.target: 配置提供程序的最简单方法是在默认位置（ ~/.kube/config ）中创建/生成配置。这使您可以将provider块完全留空。

trans-unit.source: The elastic ip address data source lists a list of eips resource information owned by an Alicloud account, and each EIP including its basic attribution and association instance.
trans-unit.target: elastic ip地址数据源列出了一个Alicloud账户所拥有的eips资源信息列表,每个EIP包括其基本归属和关联实例。

trans-unit.source: The example below builds on the Storage DRS example in the vsphere_virtual_machine resource. However, rather than use the output of the vsphere_datastore_cluster data source for the location of the virtual machine, we instead get what is assumed to be a member datastore using the vsphere_datastore data source and put the virtual machine there instead. We then use the vsphere_storage_drs_vm_override resource to ensure that Storage DRS does not apply to this virtual machine, and hence the VM will never be migrated off of the datastore.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例以 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源中的Storage DRS示例为基础。但是，而不是使用输出 vsphere_datastore_cluster 数据源虚拟机的位置，我们反而得到的是什么假设是使用会员数据存储 vsphere_datastore 数据源，并把虚拟机的出现代替。然后，我们使用 vsphere_storage_drs_vm_override 资源来确保Storage DRS不适用于该虚拟机，因此VM将永远不会从数据存储中迁移出来。

trans-unit.source: The example below creates a virtual machine in a cluster using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource in a cluster looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source. It then creates a group with this virtual machine. It also creates a host group off of the host looked up via the vsphere_host data source. Finally, this virtual machine is configured to run specifically on that host via a vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_host_rule resource.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源查找的群集中的 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源在群集中创建虚拟机。然后，它使用此虚拟机创建一个组。它还从通过 vsphere_host 数据源查找的主机创建了一个主机组。最后，将此虚拟机配置为通过 vsphere_compute_cluster_vm_host_rule 资源专门在该主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: The example below creates a virtual machine in a cluster using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource, creating the virtual machine in the cluster looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source, but also pinning the VM to a host defined by the vsphere_host data source, which is assumed to be a host within the cluster. To ensure that the VM stays on this host and does not need to be migrated back at any point in time, an override is entered using the vsphere_drs_vm_override resource that disables DRS for this virtual machine, ensuring that it does not move.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源在集群中创建虚拟机，在集群中创建由 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源查找的虚拟机，还将虚拟机固定到由 vsphere_host 数据源定义的主机上。集群中的主机。为了确保VM停留在该主机上并且不需要在任何时间点迁移回去，请使用 vsphere_drs_vm_override 资源输入替代项，该资源会禁用此虚拟机的DRS，以确保其不会移动。

trans-unit.source: The example below creates a virtual machine in a cluster using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource, creating the virtual machine in the cluster looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源在集群中创建虚拟机，并在集群中创建由 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源查找的虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: The example below creates two virtual machine in a cluster using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource in a cluster looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source. It then creates a group with this virtual machine. Two groups are created, each with one of the created VMs. Finally, a rule is created to ensure that vm1 starts before vm2.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源查找的群集中的 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源在群集中创建两个虚拟机。然后，它使用此虚拟机创建一个组。创建了两个组，每个组都有一个创建的VM。最后，创建一个规则以确保 vm1 在 vm2 之前启动。

trans-unit.source: The example below creates two virtual machines in a cluster using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource, creating the virtual machine in the cluster looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source. It then creates a group from these two virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源在集群中创建两个虚拟机，并在集群中创建由 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源查找的虚拟机。然后，从这两个虚拟机创建一个组。

trans-unit.source: The example below creates two virtual machines in a cluster using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource, creating the virtual machines in the cluster looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source. It then creates an affinity rule for these two virtual machines, ensuring they will run on the same host whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源在集群中创建两个虚拟机，并在集群中创建由 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源查找的虚拟机。然后，它为这两个虚拟机创建关联性规则，以确保它们将尽可能在同一主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: The example below creates two virtual machines in a cluster using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource, creating the virtual machines in the cluster looked up by the vsphere_compute_cluster data source. It then creates an anti-affinity rule for these two virtual machines, ensuring they will run on different hosts whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源在集群中创建两个虚拟机，并在集群中创建由 vsphere_compute_cluster 数据源查找的虚拟机。然后，它为这两个虚拟机创建一个反关联性规则，以确保它们将尽可能在不同的主机上运行。

trans-unit.source: The example below creates two virtual machines in a cluster using the vsphere_virtual_machine resource, creating the virtual machines in the datastore cluster looked up by the vsphere_datastore_cluster data source. It then creates an anti-affinity rule for these two virtual machines, ensuring they will run on different datastores whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 vsphere_virtual_machine 资源在集群中创建两个虚拟机，并在由 vsphere_datastore_cluster 数据源查找的数据存储集群中创建虚拟机。然后，它为这两个虚拟机创建一个反关联性规则，以确保它们将尽可能在不同的数据存储上运行。

trans-unit.source: The file provisioner is also able to upload a complete directory to the remote machine. When uploading a directory, there are a few important things you should know.
trans-unit.target: 文件供应器也能够将一个完整的目录上传到远程机器上。在上传目录时,有几个重要的事情你应该知道。

trans-unit.source: The files loaded must end in either .tf or .tf.json to specify the format that is in use. Otherwise, the files are ignored. Multiple file formats can be present in the same directory; it is okay to have one Terraform configuration file be Terraform syntax and another be JSON.
trans-unit.target: 加载的文件必须以 .tf 或 .tf.json 结尾,以指定使用的格式。否则，将忽略文件。同一目录中可以存在多种文件格式。可以让一个Terraform配置文件为Terraform语法，另一个为JSON。

trans-unit.source: The files that are uploaded and packaged with a push are all the files in the path given as the parameter to the command, recursively. By default (unless -vcs=false is specified), Terraform will automatically detect when a VCS such as Git is being used, and in that case will only upload the files that are committed. Because of this built-in intelligence, you don't have to worry about excluding folders such as ".git" or ".hg" usually.
trans-unit.target: push 上传和打包的文件是作为命令参数递归给出的 path 中的所有文件。默认情况下（除非指定了 -vcs=false ），Terraform将自动检测何时使用了Git之类的VCS，在这种情况下，它将仅上载已提交的文件。由于具有这种内置的智能功能，因此您不必担心通常会排除“ .git”或“ .hg”之类的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The final, merged configuration is stored on disk in the .terraform directory, which should be ignored from version control. This means that sensitive information can be omitted from version control, but it will be present in plain text on local disk when running Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 最终的合并配置存储在磁盘上的 .terraform 目录中，应从版本控制中将其忽略。这意味着可以从版本控制中忽略敏感信息，但是在运行Terraform时，敏感信息将以纯文本形式显示在本地磁盘上。

trans-unit.source: The first interface with the public network assigned to it would show up in order before the interface assigned to private. On some Linux systems, this might mean that the first interface would show up as eth0 and the second would show up as eth1.
trans-unit.target: 分配有 public 网络的第一个接口将在分配给 private 的接口之前按顺序显示。在某些Linux系统上，这可能意味着第一个接口将显示为 eth0 ，第二个接口将显示为 eth1 。

trans-unit.source: The following arguments are supported: * service_name: (Required) The name of the service. Usually of the form $apiname.endpoints.$projectid.cloud.goog. * openapi_config: (Optional) The full text of the OpenAPI YAML configuration as described here. Either this, or both of grpc_config and protoc_output must be specified. * grpc_config: (Optional) The full text of the Service Config YAML file (Example located here). If provided, must also provide protoc_output. open_api config must not be provided. * protoc_output_base64: (Optional) The full contents of the Service Descriptor File generated by protoc. This should be a compiled .pb file, base64-encoded. * protoc_output: (Deprecated) The full contents of the Service Descriptor File generated by protoc. This should be a compiled .pb file. Use protoc_output_base64 instead to prevent a permanent diff from the statefile's munging of non-UTF8 bytes. * project: (Optional) The project ID that the service belongs to. If not provided, provider project is used.
trans-unit.target: 支持以下参数：* service_name ：（必需）服务名称。通常采用 $apiname.endpoints.$projectid.cloud.goog 的形式。 * openapi_config ：（可选）中的说明的OpenAPI YAML配置的全文在这里。无论是这个，或者两者的 grpc_config 和 protoc_output 必须指定。 * grpc_config ：（可选）服务配置YAML文件的全文（示例位于此处）。如果提供，还必须提供 protoc_output 。不得提供 open_api 配置。 * protoc_output_base64 ：（可选）由protoc生成的服务描述符文件的完整内容。这应该是经过编译的.pb文件，以base64编码。 * protoc_output ：（不建议使用）protoc生成的服务描述符文件的完整内容。这应该是一个已编译的.pb文件。请改用 protoc_output_base64 ,以防止状态文件中的非UTF8字节产生永久差异。 * project ：（可选）服务所属的项目ID。如果未提供，则使用提供程序项目。

trans-unit.source: The following arguments manage network I/O control. Network I/O control (also known as network resource control) can be used to set up advanced traffic shaping for the DVS, allowing control of various classes of traffic in a fashion similar to how resource pools work for virtual machines. Configuration of network I/O control is also a requirement for the use of network resource pools, if their use is so desired.
trans-unit.target: 以下参数管理网络 I/O 控制。网络 I/O 控制(也称为网络资源控制)可用于为 DVS 设置高级流量整形,允许以类似于资源池对虚拟机的工作方式控制各种类别的流量。如果需要使用网络资源池,配置网络 I/O 控制也是使用网络资源池的要求。

trans-unit.source: The following config gives the Default Network ACL the same rules that AWS includes, but pulls the resource under management by Terraform. This means that any ACL rules added or changed will be detected as drift.
trans-unit.target: 下面的配置给Default Network ACL提供了与AWS相同的规则,但将资源拉到Terraform管理下。这意味着任何ACL规则的添加或更改都会被检测为漂移。

trans-unit.source: The following config gives the Default Security Group the same rules that AWS provides by default, but pulls the resource under management by Terraform. This means that any ingress or egress rules added or changed will be detected as drift.
trans-unit.target: 下面的配置给默认安全组提供了与AWS默认提供的规则相同的规则,但将资源拉到Terraform管理下。这意味着,任何添加或更改的入口或出口规则都会被检测为漂移。

trans-unit.source: The following example below creates a CloudFront distribution with an S3 origin.

trans-unit.source: The following example below demonstrates a "standard" example of configuring a vSphere DVS in a 3-node vSphere datacenter named dc1, across 4 NICs with two being used as active, and two being used as passive. Note that the NIC failover order propagates to any port groups configured on this DVS and can be overridden there.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明了一个“标准”示例，该示例在名为 dc1 的3节点vSphere数据中心中跨4个NIC 配置vSphere DVS，其中两个用作主动，而两个用作被动。请注意，NIC故障转移顺序会传播到此DVS上配置的任何端口组，并且可以在那里覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The following example builds on the above example by creating a vsphere_virtual_machine and applying the created tag to it:
trans-unit.target: 以下示例在上述示例的基础上，通过创建 vsphere_virtual_machine 并将创建的标签应用于该示例：

trans-unit.source: The following example builds on the above example by creating a vsphere_virtual_machine and assigning a value to created custom attribute on it.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例在上述示例的基础上，通过创建 vsphere_virtual_machine 并将值分配给在其上创建的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a compute cluster comprised of three hosts, making use of the vsphere_compute_cluster resource. DPM will be disabled in the cluster as it is the default setting, but we override the setting of the first host referenced by the vsphere_host data source (esxi1) by using the vsphere_dpm_host_override resource so it will be powered off when the cluster does not need it to service virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例利用 vsphere_compute_cluster 资源创建了一个由三个主机组成的计算集群。DPM将在集群中被禁用，因为它是默认设置，但是我们将使用 vsphere_dpm_host_override 资源覆盖由 vsphere_host 数据源（ esxi1 ）引用的第一台主机的设置，因此在集群不需要它时将其关闭电源服务虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the NSX Terraform provider to create a logical switch and tier1 logical router. It then connects the logical switch to the tier1 logical router and uplinks the T1 router to a pre-created T0 router.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例演示了使用NSX Terraform提供商创建逻辑交换机和tier1逻辑路由器。然后,它将逻辑交换机连接到tier1逻辑路由器,并将T1路由器上联到预先创建的T0路由器。

trans-unit.source: The following example locates a DVS that is named terraform-test-dvs, in the datacenter dc1. It then uses this DVS to set up a vsphere_distributed_port_group resource that uses the first uplink as a primary uplink and the second uplink as a secondary.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定位名为DVS terraform-test-dvs ，在数据中心 dc1 。然后，它使用此DVS设置 vsphere_distributed_port_group 资源，该资源使用第一个上行链路作为主要上行链路，第二个上行链路作为次要上行链路。

trans-unit.source: The following example makes use of the vsphere_vmfs_disks data source to auto-detect exported iSCSI LUNS matching a certain NAA vendor ID (in this case, LUNs exported from a NetApp). These discovered disks are then loaded into vsphere_vmfs_datastore. The datastore is also placed in the datastore-folder folder afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例利用 vsphere_vmfs_disks 数据源自动检测与某个NAA供应商ID匹配的导出的iSCSI LUN（在本例中为从NetApp导出的LUN ）。然后将这些发现的磁盘加载到 vsphere_vmfs_datastore 中。之后，数据存储区也将放置在 datastore-folder 文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves a list of VPC Ids with a custom tag of service set to a value of "production".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索VPC ID列表，其中 service 的自定义标签设置为“生产”值。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves a list of all network ACL ids in a VPC with a custom tag of Tier set to a value of "Private".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索VPC中所有网络ACL ID的列表，并将 Tier 的自定义标签设置为“ Private”的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves a list of all subnets in a VPC with a custom tag of Tier set to a value of "Private" so that the aws_instance resource can loop through the subnets, putting instances across availability zones.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例检索VPC中所有自定义标签 Tier 设置为“ Private”的子网的所有子网的列表，以便 aws_instance 资源可以循环通过子网，从而使实例跨可用性区域。

trans-unit.target: 下面的例子是检索VPC中与特定子网相关联的网络ACL id。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets up a cluster and enables DRS and vSphere HA with the default settings. The hosts have to exist already in vSphere and should not already be members of clusters - it's best to add these as standalone hosts before adding them to a cluster.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例设置了一个群集,并使用默认设置启用 DRS 和 vSphere HA。这些主机必须已经存在于 vSphere 中,并且不应该已经是群集的成员-最好在将它们添加到群集之前将其作为独立主机添加。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets up a datastore cluster and enables Storage DRS with the default settings. It then creates two NAS datastores using the vsphere_nas_datastore resource and assigns them to the datastore cluster.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例设置数据存储群集，并使用默认设置启用Storage DRS。然后，它使用 vsphere_nas_datastore 资源创建两个NAS数据存储，并将它们分配给数据存储群集。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets up a resource pool in a compute cluster which uses the default settings for CPU and memory reservations, shares, and limits. The compute cluster needs to already exist in vSphere.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例在计算群集中设置资源池,该资源池使用 CPU 和内存预留、共享和限制的默认设置。计算群集需要在 vSphere 中已经存在。

trans-unit.source: The following options control advanced operation of the virtual machine, or control various parts of Terraform workflow, and should not need to be modified during basic operation of the resource. Only change these options if they are explicitly required, or if you are having trouble with Terraform's default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 以下选项控制虚拟机的高级操作,或者控制Terraform工作流的各个部分,在资源的基本操作过程中不应该需要修改。只有在明确需要的情况下,或者对Terraform的默认行为有异议的情况下,才会修改这些选项。

trans-unit.source: The following settings configure DNS globally, generally for Linux systems. For Windows systems, this is done per-interface, see network interface settings.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置通常在Linux系统上全局配置DNS。对于Windows系统，这是按接口完成的，请参阅网络接口设置。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control Virtual Machine Component Protection (VMCP) in vSphere HA. VMCP gives vSphere HA the ability to monitor a host for datastore accessibility failures, and automate recovery for affected virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置控制 vSphere HA 中的虚拟机组件保护 (VMCP)。VMCP 使 vSphere HA 能够监控主机的数据存储可访问性故障,并为受影响的虚拟机自动恢复。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control Virtual Machine Component Protection (VMCP) overrides.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置控制虚拟机组件保护(VMCP)覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control cluster membership or tune how hosts are managed within the cluster itself by Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置可以控制集群成员资格或调整Terraform对集群本身的管理方式。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control specific settings for Admission Control when failoverHosts is selected in ha_admission_control_policy.
trans-unit.target: 时，以下设置控制允许控制特定设置 failoverHosts 中选择 ha_admission_control_policy 。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control specific settings for Admission Control when resourcePercentage is selected in ha_admission_control_policy.
trans-unit.target: 当在 ha_admission_control_policy 中选择 resourcePercentage 时，以下设置控制“准入控制”的特定设置。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control specific settings for Admission Control when slotPolicy is selected in ha_admission_control_policy.
trans-unit.target: 在 slotPolicy 中选择 ha_admission_control_policy 时，以下设置可控制“访问控制”的特定设置。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control the vSphere HA settings for the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置控制群集的vSphere HA设置。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control the Distributed Power Management (DPM) settings for the cluster. DPM allows the cluster to manage host capacity on-demand depending on the needs of the cluster, powering on hosts when capacity is needed, and placing hosts in standby when there is excess capacity in the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置控制群集的分布式电源管理（DPM）设置。DPM允许群集根据群集的需求按需管理主机容量，在需要容量时打开主机电源以及在群集中有多余容量时将主机置于备用状态。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control vSphere HA Admission Control, which controls whether or not specific VM operations are permitted in the cluster in order to protect the reliability of the cluster. Based on the constraints defined in these settings, operations such as power on or migration operations may be blocked to ensure that enough capacity remains to react to host failures.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置控制 vSphere HA Admission Control,该设置控制是否允许在群集中进行特定的虚拟机操作,以保护群集的可靠性。根据这些设置中定义的限制,可能会阻止开机或迁移操作等操作,以确保保留足够的容量来应对主机故障。

trans-unit.source: The following settings control virtual machine and application monitoring overrides.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置控制虚拟机和应用程序监控覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The following settings illustrate the options that can be set to work with virtual machine and application monitoring on vSphere HA.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置说明了可以设置为与 vSphere HA 上的虚拟机和应用程序监控配合使用的选项。

trans-unit.source: The following settings pertain to Proactive HA, an advanced feature of vSphere HA that allows the cluster to get data from external providers and make decisions based on the data reported.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置与Proactive HA有关，这是vSphere HA的一项高级功能，该功能使群集可以从外部提供商获取数据并根据报告的数据做出决策。

trans-unit.source: The following settings should be in a network_interface block in the customize sub-resource. These settings configure network interfaces on a per-interface basis and are matched up to network_interface sub-resources in the main block in the order they are declared.
trans-unit.target: 以下设置应位于 customize 子资源的 network_interface 块中。这些设置基于每个接口配置网络接口，并按照声明的顺序与主块中的 network_interface 子资源进行匹配。

trans-unit.target: 以下设置的工作方式几乎与 vsphere_compute_cluster 资源中的相应设置相同，不同之处在于某些选项还允许表示使用群集默认设置的设置。有关更多详细信息，请参见下面的各个设置。

More information about Lambda functions is available in the documentation for aws_lambda_function.

trans-unit.source: The format of the configuration files are able to be in two formats: Terraform format and JSON. The Terraform format is more human-readable, supports comments, and is the generally recommended format for most Terraform files. The JSON format is meant for machines to create, modify, and update, but can also be done by Terraform operators if you prefer. Terraform format ends in .tf and JSON format ends in .tf.json.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件的格式可以采用两种格式：Terraform格式和JSON。Terraform格式更易于阅读，支持注释，并且是大多数Terraform文件通常推荐的格式。JSON格式用于计算机创建，修改和更新，但是如果您愿意，也可以由Terraform运算符完成。Terraform格式以 .tf 结尾，而JSON格式以 .tf.json 结尾。

trans-unit.target: 给定的URL可以是 http 或 https URL。目前，此资源只能从以 text/* 或 application/json 内容类型作为响应的URL中检索数据，并且无论返回的内容类型标头如何，都期望结果以UTF-8编码。

trans-unit.source: The graph is outputted in DOT format. The typical program that can read this format is GraphViz, but many web services are also available to read this format.
trans-unit.target: 图形是以DOT格式输出的。能够读取这种格式的典型程序是GraphViz,但许多网络服务也可以读取这种格式。

trans-unit.source: The guide also expects you to run the cluster on a cloud provider where Kubernetes can automatically provision a load balancer.
trans-unit.target: 该指南还希望您在Kubernetes可以自动配置负载均衡器的云提供商上运行集群。

trans-unit.source: The hostname portion of a module source string is first passed to the service discovery protocol to determine if the given host has a module registry and, if so, the base URL for its module registry endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 首先将模块源字符串的主机名部分传递给服务发现协议，以确定给定的主机是否具有模块注册表，如果是，则确定其模块注册表端点的基本URL。

trans-unit.source: The ignition provider is what we call a logical provider and doesn't manage any physical resources. It generates configurations files to be used by other resources.
trans-unit.target: 点火提供程序是我们所谓的逻辑提供程序，不管理任何物理资源。它生成配置文件供其他资源使用。

trans-unit.source: The images data source can be used to search for and return an existing image which can then be used to provision a server.
trans-unit.target: 图像数据源可用于搜索并返回一个现有的图像,然后可用于配置服务器。

trans-unit.source: The important thing about workspace internals is that workspaces are meant to be a shared resource. They aren't a private, local-only notion (unless you're using purely local state and not committing it).
trans-unit.target: 关于工作空间内部的重要事情是,工作空间是为了成为一种共享资源。它们不是一个私有的、只属于本地的概念(除非你使用的是纯粹的本地状态,而不是提交它)。

trans-unit.source: The interface you must implement for providers is ResourceProvider.
trans-unit.target: 您必须为提供者实现的接口是ResourceProvider。

trans-unit.source: The interpolation syntax is powerful and allows you to reference variables, attributes of resources, call functions, etc.
trans-unit.target: 插值语法很强大,可以引用变量、资源的属性、调用函数等。

trans-unit.source: The issue is addressed in a pull request or commit. The issue will be referenced in the commit message so that the code that fixes it is clearly linked.
trans-unit.target: 这个问题会在拉取请求或提交中得到解决。该问题将在提交信息中提及,以便明确链接修复该问题的代码。

trans-unit.source: The issue is closed. Sometimes, valid issues will be closed to keep the issue tracker clean. The issue is still indexed and available for future viewers, or can be re-opened if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 问题已关闭。有时,有效的问题会被关闭以保持问题跟踪器的清洁。该问题仍然被编入索引,供未来的浏览者使用,或者在必要时可以重新打开。

trans-unit.source: The issue is reported.
trans-unit.target: 该问题已上报。

trans-unit.source: The issue is verified and categorized by a Terraform collaborator. Categorization is done via GitHub labels. We generally use a two-label system of (1) issue/PR type, and (2) section of the codebase. Type is usually "bug", "enhancement", "documentation", or "question", and section can be any of the providers or provisioners or "core".
trans-unit.target: 该问题由Terraform的合作者进行验证和分类。分类是通过GitHub标签来完成的。我们一般使用两个标签系统:(1)问题/PR类型,(2)代码库的部分。类型通常是 "bug"、"enhance"、"document "或 "question",section可以是任何一个提供者或provisioners或 "core"。

trans-unit.source: The job resource allows Rundeck jobs to be managed by Terraform. In Rundeck a job is a particular named set of steps that can be executed against one or more of the nodes configured for its associated project.
trans-unit.target: 作业资源允许Terraform管理Rundeck作业。在Rundeck中,作业是一组特定的命名步骤,它可以针对为其相关项目配置的一个或多个节点执行。

trans-unit.source: The key material is hashed before it is stored in the state file, so sharing the resulting state will not disclose the private key contents.
trans-unit.target: 密钥材料在存储在状态文件之前就已经进行了哈希处理,所以共享产生的状态不会泄露私钥内容。

trans-unit.source: The key material is included inline as a string, which is consistent with the way a public key is provided to the aws_key_pair, cloudstack_ssh_keypair, digitalocean_ssh_key and openstack_compute_keypair_v2 resources. This means the key_material argument can be populated from the interpolation of the public_key attribute of such a keypair resource, or vice-versa.
trans-unit.target: 密钥材料以字符串形式内联包含在内，这与向 aws_key_pair ， cloudstack_ssh_keypair ， digitalocean_ssh_key 和 openstack_compute_keypair_v2 资源提供公共密钥的方式一致。这意味着可以从此类密钥对资源的 public_key 属性的插值中填充 key_material 参数，反之亦然。

trans-unit.target: 位置数据源可用于搜索并返回一个现有的位置,然后可用于配置中的其他地方。

trans-unit.target: 日志存储是Log Service中用于收集，存储和查询日志数据的单元。每个日志存储都属于一个项目，并且每个项目都可以创建多个日志存储。详见

trans-unit.source: The main object in any Kubernetes application is a Pod. Pod consists of one or more containers that are placed on cluster nodes based on CPU or memory availability.
trans-unit.target: 任何Kubernetes应用程序的主要对象是Pod。Pod由一个或多个容器组成，这些容器根据CPU或内存的可用性放置在群集节点上。

trans-unit.source: The majority of acceptance tests will only invoke resource.Test() and exit. If at any point this method encounters an error, either in executing the provided Terraform configurations or subsequent developer defined checks, Test() will invoke the t.Error method of Go’s standard testing framework and the test will fail. A failed test will not halt or otherwise interrupt any other tests currently running.
trans-unit.target: 大多数验收测试只会调用 resource.Test() 并退出。如果此方法在执行提供的Terraform配置或后续开发人员定义的检查时遇到任何错误，则 Test() 将调用Go的标准测试框架的 t.Error 方法，并且该测试将失败。测试失败不会暂停或中断当前正在运行的任何其他测试。

trans-unit.target: 实例的市场(购买)选择。

trans-unit.source: The modules are downloaded into a local .terraform folder. This folder should not be committed to version control. The .terraform folder is created relative to your current working directory regardless of the dir argument given to this command.
trans-unit.target: 这些模块将下载到本地 .terraform 文件夹中。此文件夹不应提交给版本控制。相对于当前工作目录创建的 .terraform 文件夹，无论为此命令指定的 dir 参数如何。

trans-unit.source: The modules in The Terraform Registry are provided and maintained by trusted HashiCorp partners and the Terraform Community. If you run into issues using a module or have additional contributions to make, you can find a link to the Module's GitHub issues on the module page.
trans-unit.target: The Terraform Registry中的模块由值得信赖的HashiCorp合作伙伴和Terraform社区提供和维护。如果你在使用模块时遇到问题或有其他贡献,你可以在模块页面找到该模块的GitHub问题链接。

trans-unit.source: The most important thing you'll configure with Terraform are resources. Resources are a component of your infrastructure. It might be some low level component such as a physical server, virtual machine, or container. Or it can be a higher level component such as an email provider, DNS record, or database provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用Terraform最重要的是配置资源。资源是你的基础设施的一个组件。它可能是一些低级组件,如物理服务器、虚拟机或容器。也可以是更高层次的组件,如电子邮件提供商、DNS记录或数据库提供商。

trans-unit.source: The most interesting part of a crash log is the panic message itself and the backtrace immediately following. So the first thing to do is to search the file for panic:, which should jump you right to this message. It will look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 崩溃日志中最有趣的部分是紧急消息本身和紧随其后的回溯。因此，要做的第一件事是在文件中搜索 panic: ,这应该使您跳到该消息。它看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: The name "example" here is local to the module where it is declared and is chosen by the configuration author. This is distinct from any ID issued by the remote system, which may change over time while the resource name remains constant.
trans-unit.target: 这里的 "example "名称是声明该模块的本地名称,由配置作者选择。这与远程系统发布的任何ID不同,后者可能会随着时间的推移而改变,而资源名称则保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The name MyPlugin is a placeholder for the struct type that represents your plugin's implementation. This must implement either terraform.ResourceProvider or terraform.ResourceProvisioner, depending on the plugin type.
trans-unit.target: 名称 MyPlugin 是表示插件实现的结构类型的占位符。这必须实现 terraform.ResourceProvider 或 terraform.ResourceProvisioner ，具体取决于插件类型。

trans-unit.source: The name given in the block header is used to assign a value to the variable via the CLI and to reference the variable elsewhere in the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 块头中给出的名称用于通过CLI为变量赋值,并在配置中的其他地方引用变量。

trans-unit.source: The name given in the block header is used to reference the particular module instance from expressions within the calling module, and to refer to the module on the command line. It has no meaning outside of a particular Terraform configuration.
trans-unit.target: 块头中给出的名称用于从调用模块的表达式中引用特定的模块实例,并在命令行中引用该模块。在特定的Terraform配置之外,它没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: The name of a variable can be any valid identifier. However, due to the interpretation of module configuration blocks, the names source, version and providers are reserved for Terraform's own use and are thus not recommended for any module intended to be used as a child module.
trans-unit.target: 变量的名称可以是任何有效的标识符。但是，由于对模块配置块的解释，名称 source ， version 和 providers 保留给Terraform自己使用，因此不建议将其用作子模块。

trans-unit.source: The names given for the items in the locals block must be unique throughout a module. The given value can be any expression that is valid within the current module.
trans-unit.target: 在 locals 模块中为项目指定的名称在整个模块中必须唯一。给定值可以是在当前模块内有效的任何表达式。

trans-unit.source: The naming scheme for plugins is terraform-<type>-NAME_vX.Y.Z, where type is either provider or provisioner. Terraform uses the NAME to understand the name and version of a particular provider binary. Third-party plugins will often be distributed with an appropriate filename already set in the distribution archive so that it can be extracted directly into the plugin directory described above.
trans-unit.target: 插件的命名方案是 terraform-<type>-NAME_vX.Y.Z ，其中 type 是 provider 或 provisioner 。 Terraform使用 NAME 来了解特定提供程序二进制文件的名称和版本。第三方插件通常会以已在分发存档中设置的适当文件名分发，以便可以直接将其提取到上述插件目录中。

trans-unit.source: The naming scheme for provider plugins is terraform-provider-NAME_vX.Y.Z, and Terraform uses the name to understand the name and version of a particular provider binary. Third-party plugins will often be distributed with an appropriate filename already set in the distribution archive so that it can be extracted directly into the plugin directory described above.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序插件的命名方案是 terraform-provider-NAME_vX.Y.Z ，Terraform使用该名称来了解特定提供程序二进制文件的名称和版本。第三方插件通常会使用已在分发存档中设置的适当文件名进行分发，以便可以直接将其提取到上述插件目录中。

trans-unit.source: The official Terraform Provisioners are included in the Terraform Core codebase and are compiled into the terraform binary. While they are built in, Provisioners are still executed in a separate process over RPC, and benefit from the same discovery process as Terraform Providers, making custom Provisioners just as easy to create and use.
trans-unit.target: 正式的Terraform Provisioners已包含在Terraform Core代码库中，并已编译为 terraform 二进制文件。虽然内置了预配器，但预配器仍通过RPC在单独的过程中执行，并受益于与Terraform Providers相同的发现过程，使自定义预配器易于创建和使用。

trans-unit.source: The plan will provide you an overview of planned changes, in this case we should see 2 resources (Pod + Service) being added. This commands gets more useful as your infrastructure grows and becomes more complex with more components depending on each other and it's especially helpful during updates.
trans-unit.target: 该计划将为您提供计划变化的概述,在这种情况下,我们应该看到2个资源(Pod +服务)被添加。随着你的基础设施的发展和变得越来越复杂,更多的组件相互依赖,这个命令会变得更加有用,在更新期间特别有用。

Thus, having a GUI window open while creating your resource definition will simplify the process.
