trans-unit.source: The primary use case for this is to target a specific configuration of a provider that is configured multiple times to support multiple regions, etc.
trans-unit.target: 主要的用例是针对一个供应商的特定配置,多次配置支持多个地区等。

trans-unit.source: The primary use case of explicit depends_on is to depend on a side effect of another operation. For example: if a provisioner creates a file, and your resource reads that file, then there is no interpolation reference for Terraform to automatically connect the two resources. However, there is a causal ordering that needs to be represented. This is an ideal case for depends_on. In most cases, however, depends_on should be avoided and Terraform should be allowed to determine dependencies automatically.
trans-unit.target: 显式 depends_on 的主要用例是依赖于另一个操作的副作用。例如：如果供应商创建了一个文件，而您的资源读取了该文件，则没有Terraform的插值引用来自动连接两个资源。但是，有一个因果顺序需要表示。这是 depends_on 的理想情况。但是，在大多数情况下，应避免 depends_on ,并应允许Terraform自动确定依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: The primary use-case for the null data source is to gather together collections of intermediate values to re-use elsewhere in configuration:
trans-unit.target: null数据源的主要用例是收集中间值的集合,以便在配置的其他地方重复使用。

trans-unit.source: The primary use-case for the null resource is as a do-nothing container for arbitrary actions taken by a provisioner, as follows:
trans-unit.target: null资源的主要用途是作为供应者采取任意行动的无为容器,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: The private key resource allows SSH private keys to be stored into Rundeck's key store. The key store is where Rundeck keeps credentials that are needed to access the nodes on which it runs commands.
trans-unit.target: 私钥资源允许将SSH私钥存储到Rundeck的密钥存储中。密钥存储是Rundeck保存访问其运行命令的节点所需的凭证的地方。

trans-unit.source: The procedure for writing unit tests for Terraform follows the same setup and conventions of writing any Go unit tests. We recommend naming tests to follow the same convention as our acceptance tests, Test<Provider>_<Test Name>. For more information on Go tests, see the official Golang docs on testing.
trans-unit.target: 编写Terraform单元测试的过程遵循与编写任何Go单元测试相同的设置和约定。我们建议命名测试应遵循与验收测试相同的约定，即 Test<Provider>_<Test Name> 。有关Go测试的更多信息，请参阅test上的官方Golang文档。

trans-unit.source: The program must read all of the data passed to it on stdin, and parse it as a JSON object. The JSON object contains the contents of the query argument and its values will always be strings.
trans-unit.target: 程序必须读取在 stdin 上传递给它的所有数据，并将其解析为JSON对象。JSON对象包含 query 参数的内容，其值将始终为字符串。

trans-unit.source: The program must then produce a valid JSON object on stdout, which will be used to populate the result attribute exported to the rest of the Terraform configuration. This JSON object must again have all of its values as strings. On successful completion it must exit with status zero.
trans-unit.target: 然后，程序必须在 stdout 上生成一个有效的JSON对象，该对象将用于填充导出到Terraform配置的其余部分的 result 属性。此JSON对象必须再次将其所有值都作为字符串。成功完成后，它必须以零状态退出。

trans-unit.source: The project is the resource management unit in Log Service and is used to isolate and control resources. You can manage all the logs and the related log sources of an application by using projects. Refer to details.
trans-unit.target: 该项目是Log Service中的资源管理单元，用于隔离和控制资源。您可以使用项目来管理应用程序的所有日志和相关日志源。请参阅详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The project resource allows Rundeck projects to be managed by Terraform. In Rundeck a project is the container object for a set of jobs and the configuration for which servers those jobs can be run on.
trans-unit.target: 项目资源允许Terraform管理Rundeck项目。在Rundeck中,一个项目是一组作业的容器对象,以及这些作业可以在哪些服务器上运行的配置。

trans-unit.source: The provider allows you to manage your GitHub organization's members and teams easily. It needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: 该提供商允许您轻松管理GitHub组织的成员和团队。在使用之前,需要对它进行适当的凭证配置。

trans-unit.source: The provider also can accept both signed and self-signed server certificates. It is recommended that in production environments you only use certificates signed by a certificate authority. NSX ships by default with a self-signed server certificates as the hostname of the NSX manager is not known until the NSX administrator determines what name or IP to use.
trans-unit.target: 提供商还可以接受签名和自签名的服务器证书。建议在生产环境中只使用由证书颁发机构签署的证书。NSX默认使用自签名的服务器证书,因为在NSX管理员确定使用什么名称或IP之前,NSX管理器的主机名是不知道的。

trans-unit.source: The provider also provides session persistence options that can be configured below. These can help when using Terraform in a way where session limits could be normally reached by creating a new session for every run, such as a large amount of concurrent or consecutive Terraform runs in a short period of time.
trans-unit.target: 该提供者还提供了可以在下面配置的会话持久性选项。当使用Terraform时,如果每次运行都创建新的会话,通常会达到会话限制,例如在短时间内大量并发或连续运行Terraform时,这些选项可以提供帮助。

trans-unit.source: The provider always first tries to load a config file from a given (or default) location. Depending on whether you have current context set this may require config_context_auth_info and/or config_context_cluster and/or config_context.
trans-unit.target: 提供程序始终总是首先尝试从给定（或默认）位置加载配置文件。根据您是否设置了当前上下文，这可能需要 config_context_auth_info 和/或 config_context_cluster 和/或 config_context 。

trans-unit.source: The provider configuration block accepts the following arguments. In most cases it is recommended to set them via the indicated environment variables in order to keep credential information out of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 提供者配置块接受以下参数。在大多数情况下,建议通过指定的环境变量来设置这些参数,以避免配置中出现凭证信息。

trans-unit.source: The provider configuration block accepts the following arguments:
trans-unit.target: 提供方配置块接受以下参数。

trans-unit.source: The provider needs to be configured with proper credentials before it can be used.
trans-unit.target: 在使用之前,需要用适当的凭证配置提供者。

trans-unit.source: The providers listed below have been built by the community of Terraform users and vendors. These providers are not tested nor officially maintained by HashiCorp, and are listed here in order to help users find them easily.
trans-unit.target: 下面列出的供应商是由Terraform用户和供应商社区建立的。这些供应商既没有经过HashiCorp的测试,也没有得到HashiCorp的正式维护,在此列出这些供应商是为了帮助用户轻松找到它们。

trans-unit.source: The public key resource allows SSH public keys to be stored into Rundeck's key store. The key store is where Rundeck keeps credentials that are needed to access the nodes on which it runs commands.
trans-unit.target: 公钥资源允许将SSH公钥存储到Rundeck的密钥存储中。密钥存储是Rundeck保存访问其运行命令的节点所需的凭证的地方。

trans-unit.source: The reason Terraform uploads all of these files is because Terraform cannot know what is and isn't being used for provisioning, so it uploads all the files to be safe. To exclude certain files, specify the -exclude flag when pushing, or specify the exclude parameter in the Terraform Enterprise configuration section.
trans-unit.target: Terraform上载所有这些文件的原因是因为Terraform无法知道什么和不用于配置，所以为了安全起见，它上载了所有文件。要排除某些文件，请在 -exclude 时指定-exclude标志，或在Terraform Enterprise配置部分中指定 exclude 参数。

trans-unit.source: The reference of available configuration options is listed below. The only required argument is the path to your local salt state tree.
trans-unit.target: 可用的配置选项参考如下。唯一需要的参数是指向本地盐状态树的路径。

trans-unit.source: The reference page for each resource type provides full details on all of its supported arguments and exported attributes.
trans-unit.target: 每种资源类型的参考页面提供了其所有支持的参数和导出属性的完整细节。

trans-unit.source: The referenced task-definitions/service.json file contains a valid JSON document, which is shown below, and its content is going to be passed directly into the container_definitions attribute as a string. Please note that this example contains only a small subset of the available parameters.
trans-unit.target: 引用的 task-definitions/service.json 文件包含一个有效的JSON文档，如下所示，其内容将作为字符串直接传递到 container_definitions 属性中。请注意，此示例仅包含可用参数的一小部分。

trans-unit.source: The referer configuration supports the following:
trans-unit.target: 推荐人配置支持以下内容。

trans-unit.source: The registry at registry.terraform.io only hosts public modules, but most organizations have some modules that can't, shouldn't, or don't need to be public.
trans-unit.target: Registry.terraform.io上的注册表仅托管公共模块，但是大多数组织中的某些模块不能，不应该或不需要公开。

trans-unit.source: The registry extracts information about the module from the module's source. The module name, provider, documentation, inputs/outputs, and dependencies are all parsed and available via the UI or API, as well as the same information for any submodules or examples in the module's source repository.
trans-unit.target: 注册表从模块的源头提取模块的信息。模块名称、提供者、文档、输入/输出和依赖关系都可以通过UI或API解析和获取,以及模块源码库中任何子模块或示例的相同信息。

trans-unit.source: The registry is integrated directly into Terraform. You can reference any registry module with a source string of <NAMESPACE>/<NAME>/<PROVIDER>. Each module's information page on the registry includes its source string.
trans-unit.target: 该注册表直接集成到Terraform中。您可以使用 <NAMESPACE>/<NAME>/<PROVIDER> 的源字符串引用任何注册表模块。注册表上每个模块的信息页均包含其源字符串。

trans-unit.source: The repository and the team must both belong to the same organization on Github. This resource does not actually create any repositories; to do that, see github_repository.
trans-unit.target: 仓库和团队必须都属于Github上的同一组织。该资源实际上不会创建任何存储库；为此，请参见 github_repository 。

trans-unit.source: The requested token TTL can be controlled by the max_lease_ttl_seconds provider argument described below. It is important to consider that Terraform reads from data sources during the plan phase and writes the result into the plan. Thus a subsequent apply will likely fail if it is run after the intermediate token has expired, due to the revocation of the secrets that are stored in the plan.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过下面描述的 max_lease_ttl_seconds 提供程序参数来控制请求的令牌TTL 。重要的是要考虑Terraform在 plan 阶段从数据源读取数据并将结果写入计划。因此，由于撤消了计划中存储的机密，如果后续 apply 在中间令牌过期后运行，则可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: The required settings block supports:
trans-unit.target: 所需的 settings 块支持：

trans-unit.source: The required arguments for this resource vary depending on the type of data source selected (via the type argument). The following example is for InfluxDB. See Grafana's Data Sources Guides for more details on the supported data source types and the arguments they use.
trans-unit.target: 此资源所需的参数根据所选数据源的 type （通过类型参数）而有所不同。以下示例适用于InfluxDB。有关受支持的数据源类型及其使用的参数的更多详细信息，请参见《Grafana的数据源指南》。

trans-unit.source: The resource random_id generates random numbers that are intended to be used as unique identifiers for other resources.
trans-unit.target: 资源 random_id 生成随机数，该随机数旨在用作其他资源的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The resource random_integer generates random values from a given range, described by the min and max attributes of a given resource.
trans-unit.target: 资源 random_integer 从给定范围生成随机值，该范围由给定资源的 min 和 max 属性描述。

trans-unit.source: The resource random_pet generates random pet names that are intended to be used as unique identifiers for other resources.
trans-unit.target: 资源 random_pet 生成随机的宠物名称，该名称将用作其他资源的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The resource random_shuffle generates a random permutation of a list of strings given as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 资源 random_shuffle 生成作为参数给出的字符串列表的随机排列。

trans-unit.source: The resource random_string generates a random permutation of alphanumeric characters and optionally special characters.
trans-unit.target: 资源 random_string 生成字母数字字符和可选的特殊字符的随机排列。

trans-unit.source: The resource data source can be used to search for and return any existing ProfitBricks resource and optionally their group associations. You can provide a string for the resource type (datacenter,image,snapshot,ipblock) and/or resource id parameters which will be queries against available resources. If a single match is found, it will be returned. If your search results in multiple matches, an error will be generated. When this happens, please refine your search string so that it is specific enough to return only one result.
trans-unit.target: 资源数据源可用于搜索并返回任何现有的 ProfitBricks 资源以及它们的组关联选项。您可以为资源类型(数据中心、图像、快照、ipblock)和/或资源 id 参数提供一个字符串,这些参数将针对可用资源进行查询。如果找到一个匹配的资源,就会返回。如果你的搜索结果是多个匹配,将产生一个错误。当发生这种情况时,请改进您的搜索字符串,使其足够具体,以便只返回一个结果。

trans-unit.source: The resource exports the following attributes:
trans-unit.target: 该资源输出的属性如下:

trans-unit.source: The resource makes use of the following data sources to do its job: vsphere_datacenter to locate the datacenter, vsphere_datastore to locate the default datastore to put the virtual machine in, vsphere_resource_pool to locate a resource pool located in a cluster or standalone host, and vsphere_network to locate a network.
trans-unit.target: 资源利用的以下数据源来完成其工作： vsphere_datacenter 定位数据中心， vsphere_datastore 找到默认数据存储，把虚拟机中， vsphere_resource_pool 找到位于群集或独立主机资源池，并 vsphere_network 到定位网络。

trans-unit.source: The resource provides a piece of networked storage in the cluster provisioned by an administrator. It is a resource in the cluster just like a node is a cluster resource. Persistent Volumes have a lifecycle independent of any individual pod that uses the PV.
trans-unit.target: 资源在集群中提供了一块由管理员调配的网络存储。它是集群中的一种资源,就像节点是集群资源一样。持久性卷有一个独立于使用PV的任何单个pod的生命周期。

trans-unit.source: The resource provides mechanisms to inject containers with configuration data while keeping containers agnostic of Kubernetes. Config Map can be used to store fine-grained information like individual properties or coarse-grained information like entire config files or JSON blobs.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了注入容器配置数据的机制,同时保持容器对Kubernetes的不可知。Config Map可用于存储细粒度的信息(如单个属性)或粗粒度的信息(如整个配置文件或JSON blobs)。

trans-unit.source: The resource provides mechanisms to inject containers with sensitive information, such as passwords, while keeping containers agnostic of Kubernetes. Secrets can be used to store sensitive information either as individual properties or coarse-grained entries like entire files or JSON blobs. The resource will by default create a secret which is available to any pod in the specified (or default) namespace.
trans-unit.target: 该资源提供了将敏感信息(如密码)注入容器的机制,同时保持容器对Kubernetes的不可知。秘密可以用来存储敏感信息,既可以是单个属性,也可以是整个文件或JSON blobs等粗粒度的条目。该资源将默认创建一个秘密,该秘密可供指定(或默认)命名空间中的任何pod使用。

trans-unit.source: The resources all provide a map argument called keepers that can be populated with arbitrary key/value pairs that should be selected such that they remain the same until new random values are desired.
trans-unit.target: 所有资源都提供了一个称为 keepers 的映射参数，可以使用任意键/值对填充该参数，这些键/值对应选择为使其保持相同，直到需要新的随机值为止。

trans-unit.source: The resources created by the test are destroyed. This step happens automatically, and is the equivalent of calling terraform destroy.
trans-unit.target: 测试创建的资源被销毁。此步骤会自动发生，相当于调用 terraform destroy 。

trans-unit.source: The resources listed are sorted according to module depth order followed by alphabetical. This means that resources that are in your immediate configuration are listed first, and resources that are more deeply nested within modules are listed last.
trans-unit.target: 所列出的资源按照模块深度顺序排列,然后按字母顺序排列。这意味着在您的直接配置中的资源被列在前面,而模块中更深嵌套的资源被列在最后。

trans-unit.target: 分页结果集的响应将是这样的。

trans-unit.target: 以上结果将AWS实例的名称设置为 web-server-simple-snake 。

trans-unit.source: The result will be that baz will contain the value bar because bar.tfvars has the last definition loaded.
trans-unit.target: 结果将是 baz 包含值 bar ,因为 bar.tfvars 加载了最后一个定义。

trans-unit.target: foo 的结果值为：

trans-unit.source: The same rules apply for migration as they do for VM creation - any host specified needs to be a part of the resource pool supplied. Also keep in mind the implications of moving the virtual machine to a resource pool in another cluster or standalone host, namely ensuring that all hosts in the cluster (or the single standalone host) have access to the datastore that the virtual machine is in.
trans-unit.target: 迁移的规则与创建虚拟机的规则一样,适用于迁移--指定的任何主机都需要是提供的资源池的一部分。此外,还要牢记将虚拟机移动到另一个群集或独立主机中的资源池所带来的影响,即确保群集(或单个独立主机)中的所有主机都能访问虚拟机所在的数据存储。

trans-unit.target: 同样的设置也可以在命令行中指定如下。

trans-unit.target: 上面的架构定义了一个元素 "address" ，这是必需的字符串。Terraform的架构自动执行验证和类型转换。

trans-unit.source: The schema attribute Type determines what data is valid in configuring the element, as well as the type of data returned when used in interpolation. Schemas attributes must be one of the types defined below, and can be loosely categorized as either Primitive or Aggregate types:
trans-unit.target: 模式属性 Type 确定在配置元素时有效的数据，以及在插值中使用时返回的数据类型。模式属性必须是以下定义的类型之一，并且可以粗略地分为原始类型或聚合类型：

trans-unit.source: The second line points to the exact line of code that caused the panic, which--combined with the panic message itself--is normally enough for a developer to quickly figure out the cause of the issue.
trans-unit.target: 第二行指向引起恐慌的确切代码行,结合恐慌消息本身,通常足以让开发人员迅速找出问题的原因。

trans-unit.source: The second mechanism is optional, and affects ASGs with attached ELBs specified via the load_balancers attribute or with ALBs specified with target_group_arns.
trans-unit.target: 第二种机制是可选的，并且会影响到具有通过 load_balancers 属性指定的附加ELB 或由target_group_arns指定的 target_group_arns 。

trans-unit.source: The servers mapping supports the following:
trans-unit.target: 服务器映射支持以下内容:

trans-unit.source: The service account used to run Terraform when creating a google_folder resource must have roles/resourcemanager.folderCreator. See the Access Control for Folders Using IAM doc for more information.
trans-unit.target: 创建 google_folder 资源时用于运行Terraform的服务帐户必须具有 roles/resourcemanager.folderCreator 。有关更多信息，请参见使用IAM doc 访问文件夹的控制。

trans-unit.source: The service account used to run Terraform when creating a google_project resource must have roles/resourcemanager.projectCreator. See the Access Control for Organizations Using IAM doc for more information.
trans-unit.target: 创建 google_project 资源时用于运行Terraform的服务帐户必须具有 roles/resourcemanager.projectCreator 。有关更多信息，请参阅使用IAM doc的组织的访问控制。

trans-unit.source: The service identifier for this protocol is modules.v1, and the declared URL should always end with a slash such that the paths shown in the following sections can be appended to it.
trans-unit.target: 该协议的服务标识符是 modules.v1 ，并且声明的URL应始终以斜杠结尾，以便可以将以下各节中显示的路径附加到其后。

trans-unit.source: The settings for customize are as follows:
trans-unit.target: customize 的设置如下：

trans-unit.source: The settings here must match the IP/mask of at least one network_interface supplied to customization.
trans-unit.target: 此处的设置必须与提供给自定义的至少一个 network_interface 的IP /掩码匹配。

trans-unit.source: The settings in the linux_options sub-resource pertain to Linux guest OS customization. If you are customizing a Linux operating system, this section must be included.
trans-unit.target: linux_options 子资源中的设置与Linux来宾OS的定制有关。如果要定制Linux操作系统，则必须包括此部分。

trans-unit.source: The settings in the windows_options sub-resource pertain to Windows guest OS customization. If you are customizing a Windows operating system, this section must be included.
trans-unit.target: windows_options 子资源中的设置与Windows来宾OS的自定义有关。如果要自定义Windows操作系统，则必须包括此部分。

trans-unit.source: The simplest way to expose your application to users is via Service. Service is capable of provisioning a load-balancer in some cloud providers and managing the relationship between pods and that load balancer as new pods are launched and others die for any reason.
trans-unit.target: 向用户公开应用程序的最简单方法是通过Service。服务能够在某些云提供商中配置负载平衡器，并能够在启动新的Pod而其他Pod出于任何原因而死亡时管理Pod与该负载平衡器之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The snapshots data source can be used to search for and return an existing snapshot which can then be used to provision a server.
trans-unit.target: 快照数据源可以用来搜索和返回现有的快照,然后可以用来配置服务器。

trans-unit.source: The source tells Terraform what to create. In this example, we instantiate the Consul module for AWS from the Terraform Registry. Other source types are supported, as described in the following section.
trans-unit.target: 消息源告诉Terraform要创建什么。在此示例中，我们从Terraform Registry实例化AWS的Consul模块。支持其他源类型，如下节所述。

trans-unit.source: The special path_part value "{proxy+}" activates proxy behavior, which means that this resource will match any request path. Similarly, the aws_api_gateway_method block uses a http_method of "ANY", which allows any request method to be used. Taken together, this means that all incoming requests will match this resource.
trans-unit.target: 特殊的 path_part 值 "{proxy+}" 激活代理行为，这意味着该资源将匹配任何请求路径。类似地， aws_api_gateway_method 块使用 http_method 的 "ANY" ，这允许使用任何请求方法。综上所述，这意味着所有传入请求都将与该资源匹配。

trans-unit.source: The special arguments source, version and providers are exceptions. These are used for special purposes by Terraform and should therefore not be used as variable names within a module.
trans-unit.target: 特殊参数 source ， version 和 providers 是例外。它们由Terraform用于特殊目的，因此不应在模块内用作变量名。

trans-unit.source: The specified RDS instance must be in running status.
trans-unit.target: 指定的RDS实例必须处于运行状态。

trans-unit.source: The specified RDS instance’s whitelist must have room for more IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: 指定的RDS实例的白名单必须具有更多IP地址的空间。

trans-unit.source: The standard module expects the structure documented below. The list may appear long, but everything is optional except for the root module. All items are documented in detail. Most modules don't need to do any work to follow the standard structure.
trans-unit.target: 标准模块期望的结构如下所述。这个列表可能看起来很长,但除了根模块外,其他都是可选的。所有项目都有详细的记录。大多数模块不需要做任何工作来遵循标准结构。

trans-unit.source: The standard module structure is a file and folder layout we recommend for reusable modules. Terraform tooling is built to understand the standard module structure and use that structure to generate documentation, index modules for the registry, and more.
trans-unit.target: 标准模块结构是我们为可重用模块推荐的文件和文件夹布局。Terraform工具的构建是为了理解标准模块结构,并使用该结构来生成文档、注册表的索引模块等。

trans-unit.source: The state is in JSON format and Terraform will promise backwards compatibility with the state file. The JSON format makes it easy to write tools around the state if you want or to modify it by hand in the case of a Terraform bug. The "version" field on the state contents allows us to transparently move the format forward if we make modifications.
trans-unit.target: 状态是JSON格式的,Terraform会承诺向后兼容状态文件。JSON格式使得如果你想在状态周围写工具,或者在Terraform出现bug的情况下手动修改状态,都很容易。状态内容上的 "版本 "字段允许我们在进行修改时透明地将格式向前移动。

trans-unit.source: The state will only be saved on successful removal of all addresses. If any specific address errors for any reason (such as a syntax error), the state will not be modified at all.
trans-unit.target: 只有在成功删除所有地址时才会保存状态。如果任何特定的地址由于任何原因(如语法错误)出错,状态将不会被修改。

trans-unit.source: The supported built-in functions are:
trans-unit.target: 支持的内置功能有:

trans-unit.source: The supported operations are:
trans-unit.target: 支持的业务有:

trans-unit.source: The supported operators are:
trans-unit.target: 支持的运营商有:

trans-unit.source: The switching profile data source provides information about switching profiles configured in NSX. A switching profile is a template that defines the settings of one or more logical switches. There can be both factory default and user defined switching profiles. One example of a switching profile is a quality of service (QoS) profile which defines the QoS settings of all switches that use the defined switch profile.
trans-unit.target: 交换配置文件数据源提供有关NSX中配置的交换配置文件的信息。交换配置文件是一个模板,定义了一个或多个逻辑交换机的设置。可以有出厂默认和用户定义的交换配置文件。交换配置文件的一个例子是服务质量(QoS)配置文件,它定义了使用定义的交换配置文件的所有交换机的QoS设置。

trans-unit.source: The syntax is "${var.LIST}". For example, "${var.subnets}" would get the value of the subnets list, as a list. You can also return list elements by index: ${var.subnets[idx]}.
trans-unit.target: 语法为 "${var.LIST}" 。例如， "${var.subnets}" 将以列表形式显示 subnets 列表的值。您还可以按索引返回列表元素： ${var.subnets[idx]} 。

trans-unit.source: The syntax is MODULE.NAME.OUTPUT. For example ${module.foo.bar} will interpolate the bar output from the foomodule.
trans-unit.target: 语法为 MODULE.NAME.OUTPUT 。例如， ${module.foo.bar} 将插入 foo 模块的 bar 输出。

trans-unit.source: The syntax is TYPE.NAME.ATTRIBUTE. For example, ${aws_instance.web.id} will interpolate the ID attribute from the aws_instance resource named web. If the resource has a count attribute set, you can access individual attributes with a zero-based index, such as ${aws_instance.web.0.id}. You can also use the splat syntax to get a list of all the attributes: ${aws_instance.web.*.id}.
trans-unit.target: 语法为 TYPE.NAME.ATTRIBUTE 。例如， ${aws_instance.web.id} 将从名为 web 的 aws_instance 资源插入ID属性。如果资源设置了 count 属性，则可以使用基于零的索引访问各个属性，例如 ${aws_instance.web.0.id} 。您还可以使用splat语法获取所有属性的列表： ${aws_instance.web.*.id} 。

trans-unit.source: The syntax is count.FIELD. For example, ${count.index} will interpolate the current index in a multi-count resource. For more information on count, see the resource configuration page.
trans-unit.target: 语法为 count.FIELD 。例如， ${count.index} 将在多计数资源中插入当前索引。有关 count 更多信息，请参见资源配置页面。

trans-unit.source: The syntax is data.TYPE.NAME.ATTRIBUTE. For example. ${data.aws_ami.ubuntu.id} will interpolate the id attribute from the aws_amidata source named ubuntu. If the data source has a count attribute set, you can access individual attributes with a zero-based index, such as ${data.aws_subnet.example.0.cidr_block}. You can also use the splat syntax to get a list of all the attributes: ${data.aws_subnet.example.*.cidr_block}.
trans-unit.target: 语法为 data.TYPE.NAME.ATTRIBUTE 。例如。 ${data.aws_ami.ubuntu.id} 将对名为 ubuntu 的 aws_ami 数据源的 id 属性进行插值。如果数据源设置了 count 属性，则可以使用基于零的索引访问各个属性，例如 ${data.aws_subnet.example.0.cidr_block} 。您还可以使用splat语法获取所有属性的列表： ${data.aws_subnet.example.*.cidr_block} 。

trans-unit.source: The syntax is path.TYPE. TYPE can be cwd, module, or root. cwd will interpolate the current working directory. module will interpolate the path to the current module. root will interpolate the path of the root module. In general, you probably want the path.module variable.
trans-unit.target: 语法为 path.TYPE 。TYPE可以是 cwd ， module 或 root 。 cwd 将内插当前工作目录。 module 将插补当前模块的路径。 root 将插入根模块的路径。通常，您可能需要 path.module 变量。

trans-unit.source: The syntax is self.ATTRIBUTE. For example ${self.private_ip} will interpolate that resource's private IP address.
trans-unit.target: 语法为 self.ATTRIBUTE 。例如， ${self.private_ip} 将插入该资源的专用IP地址。

trans-unit.source: The syntax is terraform.FIELD. This variable type contains metadata about the currently executing Terraform run. FIELD can currently only be env to reference the currently active state environment.

trans-unit.source: The syntax of Terraform configurations is called HashiCorp Configuration Language (HCL). It is meant to strike a balance between human readable and editable as well as being machine-friendly. For machine-friendliness, Terraform can also read JSON configurations. For general Terraform configurations, however, we recommend using the HCL Terraform syntax.
trans-unit.target: Terraform配置的语法称为HashiCorp配置语言（HCL）。它旨在在人类可读性与可编辑性以及机器友好性之间取得平衡。为了机器友好，Terraform也可以读取JSON配置。但是，对于常规Terraform配置，我们建议使用HCL Terraform语法。

trans-unit.source: The vrack attachment isn't a proper resource with an ID. As such, the resource id will be forged from the vrack and project ids and there's no correct way to import the resource in terraform. Otherwise, it will try to attach the vrack with the public cloud project.
trans-unit.target: vrack附件并不是一个正确的有ID的资源,因此,资源ID会从vrack和项目ID中伪造出来,在terraform中没有正确的方法导入资源。因此,资源id将由vrack和项目id伪造,并且在terraform中没有正确的方法导入资源。当资源被terraform创建时,它首先会检查附件是否已经存在于OVH基础设施中;如果存在,它就会设置资源id而不做任何修改。否则,它将尝试用公有云项目附加vrack。

trans-unit.source: There is a significant downside to this approach. Statically compiled binaries are much larger than dynamically-linked binaries because they include everything they need to run. And because Terraform shares a lot of code with its plugins, there is a lot of binary data duplicated between each of these programs.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法有一个显著的缺点。静态编译的二进制文件比动态链接的二进制文件大得多,因为它们包含了运行所需的一切。而且由于Terraform与其插件共享大量代码,所以每个程序之间都有大量的二进制数据重复。

trans-unit.source: There is no way currently to unset map values in Terraform. Whenever a map is modified either via variable input or being passed into a module, the values are always merged.
trans-unit.target: 目前在Terraform中还没有办法取消设置地图值。每当通过变量输入或传递到模块中的地图被修改时,其值总是被合并。

trans-unit.source: There were several major deprecation notices introduced in 2.0.0. This reviews the details of each and provides migration instructions to the appropriate resources.
trans-unit.target: 在2.0.0中引入了几个主要的弃用通知。 这将回顾每个通知的细节,并提供迁移到相应资源的说明。

trans-unit.source: Therefore in a development environment with frequent deployments it may be convenient to set a relatively-short expiration time and use early renewal to automatically provision a new certificate when the current one is about to expire.
trans-unit.target: 因此在频繁部署的开发环境中,可以设置一个相对较短的到期时间,在当前证书即将到期时,使用提前续费的方式自动提供新的证书,这可能会比较方便。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, for mapping configuration to resources in the real world, Terraform uses its own state structure.
trans-unit.target: 因此,对于将配置映射到现实世界中的资源,Terraform使用自己的状态结构。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can enter the source of any module, satisfy any required variables, run terraform apply, and expect it to work.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以输入任何模块的源代码，满足任何必需的变量，运行 terraform apply 并期望其工作。

trans-unit.source: These are unsupported because the endpoint needs to be authorized and does not generate an ARN until the target email address has been validated. This breaks the Terraform model and as a result are not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 这些都是不支持的,因为终端需要被授权,并且在目标电子邮件地址被验证之前不会生成ARN。这破坏了Terraform模型,因此目前不支持。

trans-unit.source: These arguments are inserted directly after the subcommand (such as plan) and before any flags specified directly on the command-line. This behavior ensures that flags on the command-line take precedence over environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 这些参数被直接插入后的子命令（如 plan ）和之前的任何标志直接指定的命令行。此行为可确保命令行上的标志优先于环境变量。

trans-unit.source: These arguments are supported for backwards compatibility, and may be removed in a future version:
trans-unit.target: 这些参数是为了向后兼容而支持的,在未来的版本中可能会被删除。

trans-unit.source: These attributes are exported, but they are expected to change over time and so should only be used for informational purposes, not for resource dependencies:
trans-unit.target: 这些属性被导出,但预计它们会随着时间的推移而改变,因此只应用于信息目的,而不是用于资源依赖性。

trans-unit.source: These can be specified as "on" or "off" string. Similar to boolean values, but here the empty string also means to use the existing value. Attributes available:
trans-unit.target: 这些可以指定为 "on "或 "off "字符串。类似于布尔值,但这里的空字符串也意味着使用现有的值。可用的属性。

trans-unit.source: These changes only update Terraform state when applied, hence it is safe to run when the virtual machine is running. If more settings are being modified, you may need to plan maintenance accordingly for any necessary re-configuration of the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 这些更改只在应用时更新Terraform状态,因此在虚拟机运行时是安全的。如果正在修改更多的设置,您可能需要为虚拟机的任何必要的重新配置制定相应的维护计划。

trans-unit.source: These endpoints list modules according to some criteria.
trans-unit.target: 这些端点根据一些标准列出模块。

trans-unit.source: These examples assume the following Terraform output snippet.
trans-unit.target: 这些例子假设了以下Terraform的输出片段。

trans-unit.source: These functions usually test only for the resource directly under test: we skip the check that the azurerm_resource_group has been destroyed when testing azurerm_resource_group, under the assumption that azurerm_resource_group is tested independently in its own acceptance tests.
trans-unit.target: 这些功能通常仅针对直接测试的资源进行测试：假设 azurerm_resource_group 在其自己的接受测试中进行了独立测试，则在测试 azurerm_resource_group 时，我们将跳过 azurerm_resource_group 被销毁的检查。

trans-unit.source: These inherit their settings from the replication group.
trans-unit.target: 这些设置继承了复制组的设置。

trans-unit.source: These parameters can be used to ensure that service is being provided before Terraform moves on. If new instances don't pass the ELB's health checks for any reason, the Terraform apply will time out, and the ASG will be marked as tainted (i.e. marked to be destroyed in a follow up run).
trans-unit.target: 这些参数可以用来确保在Terraform继续前进之前提供服务。如果新的实例由于任何原因没有通过ELB的健康检查,Terraform的应用将超时,ASG将被标记为污点(即标记为在后续运行中被销毁)。

trans-unit.source: These resources have been updated (or created) to use the correct catalog APIs as with consul_catalog_entry, but provide a first-class resource name.
trans-unit.target: 与 consul_catalog_entry 一样，这些资源已更新（或创建）为使用正确的目录API ，但提供了一流的资源名称。

trans-unit.target: 这些设置需要 vSphere 6.0 或更高版本。

trans-unit.target: 这两个软件包都是“主要”软件包，可以通过 go install 内置到单独的可执行文件中：

trans-unit.source: These values map to the Terraform variables like so:
trans-unit.target: 这些值与Terraform变量的映射是这样的。

trans-unit.source: These will fetch the modules using HTTPS. If you want to use SSH instead:
trans-unit.target: 这些将使用HTTPS来获取模块。如果你想使用SSH代替。

trans-unit.source: They accept positive integer query variables offset and limit which have the usual SQL-like semantics. Each endpoint will have a sane default limit and a default offset of 0. Each endpoint will also apply a sane maximum limit, requesting more results will just result in the maximum limit being used.
trans-unit.target: 它们接受具有通常SQL式语义的正整数查询变量 offset 和 limit 。每个端点将具有健全的默认限制和默认偏移量 0 。每个端点还将应用合理的最大限制，请求更多结果只会导致使用最大限制。

trans-unit.source: Third-Party Integrations
trans-unit.target: 第三方整合

trans-unit.source: Third-party Plugins
trans-unit.target: 第三方插件

trans-unit.source: Third-party providers can be manually installed by placing their plugin executables in one of the following locations depending on the host operating system:
trans-unit.target: 第三方供应商可以通过将其插件可执行文件放置在以下位置之一,根据主机操作系统进行手动安装。

trans-unit.source: This allows fine-grained control over when provisioners run in the dependency graph.
trans-unit.target: 这允许细粒度地控制供应者何时在依赖图中运行。

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to have full control over the attributes supplied to an instance during instance creation. There are, as well, some attributes that get populated during instance creation, and the full attributes map can be seen via the exported attributes attribute.
trans-unit.target: 这允许用户在实例创建期间完全控制提供给实例的属性。同样，在实例创建过程中也会填充一些属性，并且可以通过导出的 attributes 属性查看完整的属性映射。

trans-unit.source: This allows volumes to be attached to servers.
trans-unit.target: 这允许将卷连接到服务器。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to manage your webhooks on a repository.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你在一个资源库上管理你的webhooks。

trans-unit.source: This alternate example details how to clone a VM from a template that came from an OVF/OVA file. This leverages the resource's vApp properties capabilities to set appropriate keys that control various configuration settings on the virtual machine or virtual appliance. In this scenario, using customize is not recommended as the functionality has tendency to overlap.
trans-unit.target: 此替代示例详细说明了如何从OVF / OVA文件的模板克隆VM。这将利用资源的vApp属性功能来设置适当的密钥，以控制虚拟机或虚拟设备上的各种配置设置。在这种情况下，不建议使用 customize 因为功能倾向于重叠。

trans-unit.source: This approach is recommended in the common case where only a single configuration is needed for each provider across the entire configuration.
trans-unit.target: 在常见的情况下,建议采用这种方法,因为在整个配置中,每个提供商只需要一个配置。

trans-unit.source: This assumes we have a bucket created called mybucket. The Terraform state is written to the key path/to/my/key.
trans-unit.target: 假设我们创建了一个名为 mybucket 的存储桶。Terraform状态将写入密钥 path/to/my/key 。

trans-unit.source: This attribute has been deprecated. Use the google_service_account_iam_* resources instead.
trans-unit.target: 此属性已被弃用。请改用google_service_account_iam_ *资源。

trans-unit.source: This backend supports state locking.
trans-unit.target: 该后端支持状态锁定。

trans-unit.source: This behavior was adopted from the standard behavior of rsync.
trans-unit.target: 此行为是从rsync的标准行为采用的。

trans-unit.source: This can be set prior to running the unit tests to opt-out of any tests requiring remote network connectivity. The unit tests make an attempt to automatically detect when connectivity is unavailable and skip the relevant tests, but by setting this variable you can force these tests to be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量可以在运行单元测试之前设置,以退出任何需要远程网络连接的测试。当连接不可用时,单元测试会尝试自动检测并跳过相关测试,但通过设置这个变量,你可以强制跳过这些测试。

trans-unit.source: This can be used both to validate a prefix list given in a variable and to obtain the CIDR blocks (IP address ranges) for the associated AWS service. The latter may be useful e.g. for adding network ACL rules.
trans-unit.target: 这既可用于验证变量中给出的前缀列表,也可用于获取相关AWS服务的CIDR块(IP地址范围)。后者可能很有用,例如用于添加网络ACL规则。

trans-unit.source: This can be used both to validate an availability zone given in a variable and to split the AZ name into its component parts of an AWS region and an AZ identifier letter. The latter may be useful e.g. for implementing a consistent subnet numbering scheme across several regions by mapping both the region and the subnet letter to network numbers.
trans-unit.target: 这既可以用来验证变量中给出的可用性区域,也可以将AZ名称分割成AWS区域和AZ标识符的组成部分。后者可能很有用,例如,通过将区域和子网字母映射到网络编号,在几个区域之间实施一致的子网编号方案。

trans-unit.source: This can be used for simple resource renaming, moving items to and from a module, moving entire modules, and more. And because this command can also move data to a completely new state, it can also be used for refactoring one configuration into multiple separately managed Terraform configurations.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用于简单的资源重命名,将项目移入或移出模块,移动整个模块等。而且由于这个命令也可以将数据移动到一个全新的状态,所以也可以用于将一个配置重构成多个单独管理的Terraform配置。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to initialize your cluster with system jobs, common services, and more. In day to day Nomad use it is common for developers to submit jobs to Nomad directly, such as for general app deployment. In addition to these apps, a Nomad cluster often runs core system services that are ideally setup during infrastructure creation. This resource is ideal for the latter type of job, but can be used to manage any job within Nomad.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用来初始化你的集群与系统作业、通用服务等。在日常的Nomad使用中,开发者直接向Nomad提交作业是很常见的,比如用于一般的应用部署。除了这些应用,Nomad集群还经常运行核心系统服务,这些服务最好在创建基础设施时设置。该资源是后一种类型作业的理想选择,但可以用于管理Nomad内的任何作业。

trans-unit.source: This command will not modify infrastructure, but does modify the state file in order to mark a resource as tainted. Once a resource is marked as tainted, the next plan will show that the resource will be destroyed and recreated and the next apply will implement this change.
trans-unit.target: 该命令不会修改基础结构，但是会修改状态文件，以将资源标记为已污染。将资源标记为已污染后，下一个计划将显示该资源将被销毁并重新创建，而下一个应用将实施此更改。

trans-unit.source: This command will not modify infrastructure, but does modify the state file in order to unmark a resource as tainted.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不会修改基础结构，但是会修改状态文件，以将资源取消标记为已污染。

trans-unit.source: This command does not check formatting (e.g. tabs vs spaces, newlines, comments etc.).
trans-unit.target: 该命令不检查格式（例如，制表符与空格，换行符，注释等）。

trans-unit.source: This command accepts all the arguments and flags that the apply command accepts, with the exception of a plan file argument.
trans-unit.target: 该命令接受apply命令接受的所有参数和标志，但计划文件参数除外。

trans-unit.source: This command flags that this object must be re-created in the next Terraform plan, so a subsequent terraform apply will then replace the deployment and thus activate the latest configuration changes.
trans-unit.target: 该命令标记必须在下一个Terraform计划中重新创建此对象，因此随后的Terraform terraform apply 将替换部署并因此激活最新的配置更改。

trans-unit.source: This command gives an overview of all of the current dependencies, as an aid to understanding why a particular provider is needed.
trans-unit.target: 该命令提供了所有当前依赖关系的概览,以帮助理解为什么需要某个特定的提供者。

trans-unit.source: This command is a container for further subcommands. These subcommands are listed in the navigation bar.
trans-unit.target: 该命令是其他子命令的容器。这些子命令列在导航栏中。

trans-unit.source: This command is a convenient way to check whether the execution plan for a set of changes matches your expectations without making any changes to real resources or to the state. For example, terraform plan might be run before committing a change to version control, to create confidence that it will behave as expected.
trans-unit.target: 此命令是检查一组更改的执行计划是否符合您的期望而不对实际资源或状态进行任何更改的便捷方法。例如，可以在对版本控制进行更改之前运行 terraform plan ，以建立对其预期行为的信心。

trans-unit.source: This command is a nested subcommand, meaning that it has further subcommands. These subcommands are listed to the left.
trans-unit.target: 该命令是一个嵌套子命令,意味着它还有其他子命令。这些子命令列在左边。

trans-unit.source: This command is always safe to run multiple times, to bring the working directory up to date with changes in the configuration. Though subsequent runs may give errors, this command will never delete your existing configuration or state.
trans-unit.target: 这个命令总是安全的,可以多次运行,使工作目录随着配置的变化而更新。虽然后续的运行可能会出错,但这个命令永远不会删除你现有的配置或状态。

trans-unit.source: This command locates the AWS instance with ID i-abcd1234 and attaches its existing settings, as described by the EC2 API, to the name aws_instance.example in the Terraform state.
trans-unit.target: 该命令查找ID为 i-abcd1234 的AWS实例，并将其现有设置（如EC2 API所述） aws_instance.example 到Terraform状态下的名称aws_instance.example中。

trans-unit.source: This command performs several different initialization steps in order to prepare a working directory for use. More details on these are in the sections below, but in most cases it is not necessary to worry about these individual steps.
trans-unit.target: 这条命令会执行几个不同的初始化步骤,以便为使用工作目录做准备。关于这些步骤的更多细节在下面的章节中,但在大多数情况下,没有必要担心这些单独的步骤。

trans-unit.source: This command requires a address that points to a single resource in the state. Addresses are in resource addressing format.
trans-unit.target: 该命令需要一个地址，该地址指向该状态下的单个资源。地址采用资源寻址格式。

trans-unit.source: This command requires a source and destination address of the item to move. Addresses are in resource addressing format.
trans-unit.target: 此命令需要移动项目的源和目标地址。地址采用资源寻址格式。

trans-unit.source: This command requires one or more addresses that point to a resources in the state. Addresses are in resource addressing format.
trans-unit.target: 此命令需要一个或多个指向状态中资源的地址。地址采用资源寻址格式。

trans-unit.source: This command should rarely be used. It is meant only as a utility in case manual intervention is necessary with the remote state.
trans-unit.target: 这个命令应该很少使用。它只是作为一个实用工具,在需要对远程状态进行手动干预时使用。

trans-unit.source: This command will create a new workspace with the given name. A workspace with this name must not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将以给定的名称创建一个新的工作区。此名称的工作区必须不存在。

trans-unit.source: This command will delete the specified workspace.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将删除指定的工作区。

trans-unit.source: This command will download any modules that haven't been updated already, as well as performing other Terraform working directory initialization such as installing providers.
trans-unit.target: 这条命令将下载所有尚未更新的模块,并执行其他Terraform工作目录的初始化,例如安装供应商。

trans-unit.source: This command will download the state from its current location and output the raw format to stdout.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将从当前位置下载状态,并以原始格式输出到stdout。

trans-unit.source: This command will move an item matched by the address given to the destination address. This command can also move to a destination address in a completely different state file.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将把与给定地址相匹配的项目移动到目的地址。该命令也可以移动到完全不同状态文件中的目的地址。

trans-unit.source: This command will output 5 values:
trans-unit.target: 该命令将输出5个值。

trans-unit.source: This command will output a backup copy of the state prior to saving any changes. The backup cannot be disabled. Due to the destructive nature of this command, backups are required.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将在保存任何更改之前输出状态的备份副本。该备份不能被禁用。由于该命令的破坏性,需要进行备份。

trans-unit.source: This command will push the state specified by PATH to the currently configured backend.
trans-unit.target: 此命令会将PATH指定的状态推送到当前配置的后端。

trans-unit.source: This command will select another workspace. The named workspace must already exist.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将选择另一个工作区。命名的工作区必须已经存在。

trans-unit.source: This config denies all traffic in the Default ACL. This can be useful if you want a locked down default to force all resources in the VPC to assign a non-default ACL.
trans-unit.target: 该配置拒绝默认ACL中的所有流量。如果你想锁定默认值,迫使VPC中的所有资源分配一个非默认的ACL,这个配置就很有用。

trans-unit.source: This config will write a single service unit (shown below) with the contents of an example service. This unit will be enabled as a dependency of multi-user.target and therefore start on boot
trans-unit.target: 这个配置将编写一个包含服务示例内容的服务单元(如下所示)。这个单元将作为multi-user.target的一个依赖项被启用,因此在启动时就会启动。

trans-unit.source: This data source allows to find a Hosted Zone ID given Hosted Zone name and certain search criteria.
trans-unit.target: 这个数据源可以查找给定的主机区名称和特定的搜索标准的主机区ID。

trans-unit.source: This data source allows you to use data encrypted with Google Cloud KMS within your resource definitions.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源允许您在您的资源定义中使用谷歌云KMS加密的数据。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM group. By using this data source, you can reference IAM group properties without having to hard code ARNs as input.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源可用于获取特定IAM组的信息。通过使用该数据源,您可以引用IAM组的属性,而无需硬编码ARN作为输入。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM instance profile. By using this data source, you can reference IAM instance profile properties without having to hard code ARNs as input.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源可用于获取特定IAM实例配置文件的信息。通过使用该数据源,您可以引用IAM实例配置文件属性,而无需硬编码ARN作为输入。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM policy.
trans-unit.target: 这个数据源可以用来获取特定IAM策略的信息。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM role. By using this data source, you can reference IAM role properties without having to hard code ARNs as input.
trans-unit.target: 这个数据源可以用来获取特定IAM角色的信息。通过使用该数据源,您可以引用IAM角色属性,而无需硬编码ARN作为输入。

trans-unit.source: This data source can be used to fetch information about a specific IAM user. By using this data source, you can reference IAM user properties without having to hard code ARNs or unique IDs as input.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源可用于获取特定IAM用户的信息。通过使用该数据源,您可以引用IAM用户属性,而无需硬编码ARN或唯一ID作为输入。

trans-unit.source: This data source can prove useful when a module accepts an LB Listener as an input variable and needs to know the LB it is attached to, or other information specific to the listener in question.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个LB监听器作为输入变量,并且需要知道它所连接的LB,或者其他有关监听器的特定信息时,这个数据源可以证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This data source can prove useful when a module accepts an LB Target Group as an input variable and needs to know its attributes. It can also be used to get the ARN of an LB Target Group for use in other resources, given LB Target Group name.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个LB目标组作为输入变量并需要知道它的属性时,这个数据源可以证明是有用的。它还可用于获取LB目标组的ARN,以便在其他资源中使用,给定LB目标组名称。

trans-unit.source: This data source can prove useful when a module accepts an LB as an input variable and needs to, for example, determine the security groups associated with it, etc.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模块接受一个LB作为输入变量,并需要例如确定与其相关联的安全组等时,这个数据源可以证明是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This data source fetches the project name, and provides the appropriate URLs to use for container registry for this project.
trans-unit.target: 这个数据源获取项目名称,并提供适当的URL用于这个项目的容器注册表。

trans-unit.source: This data source is different from the consul_service (singular) data source, which provides a detailed response about a specific Consul service.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源与 consul_service （单一）数据源不同，后者提供有关特定Consul服务的详细响应。

trans-unit.source: This data source is different from the consul_services (plural) data source, which provides a summary of the current Consul services.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源与 consul_services （多个）数据源不同，后者提供了当前Consul服务的摘要。

trans-unit.source: This data source is used to define IAM policies to apply to other resources. Currently, defining a policy through a datasource and referencing that policy from another resource is the only way to apply an IAM policy to a resource.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源用于定义IAM策略以应用于其他资源。目前,通过数据源定义策略并从另一个资源中引用该策略是将IAM策略应用于资源的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: This data source provides information about Edge clusters configured in NSX. An Edge cluster is a collection of Edge nodes which can be deployed as either VM form-factor or bare-metal form-factor machines for connectivity between overlay logical switches and non-NSX underlay networking for north/south layer 2 or layer 3 connectivity. Each T0 router will be placed on one ore more Edge nodes in an Edge cluster therefore this data source is needed for the creation of T0 logical routers.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源提供了有关在 NSX 中配置的 Edge 集群的信息。边缘集群是边缘节点的集合,它可以部署为虚拟机形式或裸机形式的机器,用于覆盖逻辑交换机和非NSX底层网络之间的连接,以实现南北第2层或第3层的连接。每个T0路由器将被放置在一个边缘集群中的一个或多个边缘节点上,因此在创建T0逻辑路由器时需要这个数据源。

trans-unit.source: This data source provides information about Transport Zones (TZ) configured in NSX. A Transport Zone defines the scope to which a network can extend in NSX. For example an overlay based Transport Zone is associated with both hypervisors and logical switches and defines which hypervisors will be able to serve the defined logical switch. Virtual machines on the hypervisor associated with a Transport Zone can be attached to logical switches in that same Transport Zone.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源提供了有关在NSX中配置的传输区(TZ)的信息。传输区定义了网络在NSX中可以扩展的范围。例如,基于叠加的传输区同时与管理程序和逻辑交换机相关联,并定义了哪些管理程序将能够为定义的逻辑交换机提供服务。与传输区关联的管理程序上的虚拟机可以连接到同一传输区的逻辑交换机上。

trans-unit.source: This data source provides information about a network and security (NS) service configured in NSX. NS services are either factory defined in NSX or can be defined by the NSX administrator. They provide a convenience name for a port/protocol pair that is often used in fire walling or load balancing.
trans-unit.target: 此数据源提供有关在 NSX 中配置的网络和安全 (NS)服务的信息。NS服务可以在NSX中出厂定义,也可以由NSX管理员定义。它们为端口/协议对提供了一个方便的名称,通常用于防火墙或负载平衡。

trans-unit.source: This data source provides information about logical Tier 0 routers configured in NSX. A Tier 0 router is used to connect NSX networking with traditional physical networking. Tier 0 routers are placed on an Edge cluster and will exist on one or more Edge node depending on deployment settings (i.e. active/active or active/passive). A Tier 0 router forwards layer 3 IP packets and typically peers with a traditional physical router using BGP or can use static routing.
trans-unit.target: 该数据源提供了有关NSX中配置的逻辑Tier 0路由器的信息。Tier 0路由器用于连接NSX网络和传统物理网络。Tier 0路由器被放置在边缘集群上,并将根据部署设置(即主动/主动或主动/被动)存在一个或多个边缘节点上。Tier 0路由器转发第3层IP数据包,通常使用BGP与传统物理路由器对等,也可以使用静态路由。

trans-unit.source: This directory must already exist before Terraform will cache plugins; Terraform will not create the directory itself.
trans-unit.target: 在Terraform缓存插件之前,这个目录必须已经存在;Terraform不会自己创建这个目录。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a tag category named terraform-test-category, with single cardinality (meaning that only one tag in this category can be assigned to an object at any given time). Tags in this category can only be assigned to VMs and datastores.

trans-unit.source: This example creates a tag named terraform-test-tag. This tag is assigned the terraform-test-category category, which was created by the vsphere_tag_category resource. The resulting tag can be assigned to VMs and datastores only, and can be the only value in the category that can be assigned, as per the restrictions defined by the category.
trans-unit.target: 本示例创建一个名为 terraform-test-tag 的标签。该标签分配了 terraform-test-category 类别，该类别由 vsphere_tag_category 资源创建。根据类别定义的限制，结果标签只能分配给VM和数据存储，并且可以是类别中可以分配的唯一值。

trans-unit.source: This group includes cloud providers offering a range of services including IaaS, SaaS, and PaaS offerings. This group of cloud providers includes some smaller scale clouds or ones with more specialized offerings. The Terraform provider and associated resources for these clouds are primarily supported by the cloud vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这类云提供商包括提供IaaS、SaaS和PaaS产品等一系列服务的云提供商。这类云提供商包括一些规模较小的云或提供更专业服务的云。这些云的Terraform提供商和相关资源主要是由云供应商与HashiCorp密切合作支持的,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This group includes hyper-scale cloud providers that offer a range of services including IaaS, SaaS, and PaaS. A large percentage of Terraform users provision their infrastructure on these major cloud providers. HashiCorp closely partners with these cloud providers to offer best-in-class integration to provision and manage the majority of the services offered. These providers are primarily supported by the cloud vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这一组包括提供一系列服务的超大规模云提供商,包括IaaS、SaaS和PaaS。很大比例的Terraform用户在这些主要的云供应商上配置他们的基础设施。HashiCorp与这些云提供商紧密合作,提供一流的集成,以提供和管理大部分服务。这些供应商主要由云供应商与HashiCorp密切合作提供支持,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This guide assumes that you have the Azure CLI 2.0 (Python) installed.
trans-unit.target: 本指南假定您已安装Azure CLI 2.0（Python）。

trans-unit.source: This guide covers the schema and structure for implementing a Terraform provider using the provider framework. As next steps, reference the internal providers for examples. Terraform also includes a full framework for testing providers.
trans-unit.target: 本指南涵盖了使用提供者框架实现Terraform提供者的模式和结构。作为下一步,参考内部提供者的例子。Terraform还包括测试提供者的完整框架。

trans-unit.source: This guide creates a very simple API Gateway Configuration with a single resource that passes through all requests to a single destination. The upgrade steps then modify only the AWS Lambda function, leaving the API Gateway configuration unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 本指南创建了一个非常简单的API网关配置,它使用一个单一的资源,将所有请求传递到一个单一的目的地。然后,升级步骤只修改AWS Lambda函数,保持API网关配置不变。

trans-unit.source: This guide focuses mainly on the latter part and expects you to have a properly configured & running Kubernetes cluster.
trans-unit.target: 本指南主要关注后一部分，并希望您具有正确配置并正在运行的Kubernetes集群。

trans-unit.source: This guide will show how to deploy a sample architecture using Terraform. The guide assumes some basic familiarity with Kubernetes but does not assume any pre-existing deployment. It also assumes that you are familiar with the usual Terraform plan/apply workflow; if you're new to Terraform itself, refer first to the Getting Started guide.
trans-unit.target: 本指南将展示如何使用Terraform部署示例架构。该指南假定您对Kubernetes有一些基本的了解，但不假定任何预先存在的部署。它还假定您熟悉通常的Terraform计划/应用工作流程；如果您不熟悉Terraform本身，请首先参考《入门指南》。

The guide assumes some basic familiarity with Lambda and API Gateway but does not assume any pre-existing deployment. It also assumes that you are familiar with the usual Terraform plan/apply workflow; if you're new to Terraform itself, refer first to the Getting Started guide.

trans-unit.target: 这是一个数据源，可用于构造IAM策略文档的JSON表示形式，以便与需要策略文档的资源（例如 aws_iam_policy 资源）一起使用。

trans-unit.target: 这是一个很好的里程碑! 应用程序的第一个版本已经部署和访问。接下来我们将看到如何部署应用程序的新版本。

trans-unit.source: This is a great way to slowly transition infrastructure to Terraform, or to be able to be confident that you can use Terraform in the future if it potentially doesn't support every feature you need today.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个很好的方式,可以慢慢地将基础架构过渡到Terraform,或者说,如果Terraform有可能不支持你今天所需要的每一个功能,你可以放心地在未来使用Terraform。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of Version Control System (VCS) providers that offer capabilities of using Terraform to manage your VCS projects, teams and repositories. Terraform integrates with these services to create and manage resources provided by the VCS. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组版本控制系统(VCS)供应商,他们提供使用Terraform管理VCS项目、团队和存储库的能力。Terraform与这些服务集成,以创建和管理VCS提供的资源。这些供应商主要由供应商与HashiCorp密切合作提供支持,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of database providers offer specific capabilities to provision and configure your database resources. Terraform integrates with with these database services using the specific provider to provision and manages database resources. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组数据库提供商,他们提供特定的功能来配置和配置你的数据库资源。Terraform与这些数据库服务集成,使用特定的供应商来配置和管理数据库资源。这些提供商主要是由厂商与HashiCorp密切合作支持的,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of miscellaneous providers offer specific capabilities that can be useful when working with Terraform. These providers are primarily supported by the vendors and the Terraform community, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组提供特定功能的杂牌供应商,在使用Terraform时可能会有用。这些供应商主要由供应商和Terraform社区支持,并由HashiCorp测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of monitoring & system management providers that offer the capability to configure and manage services such as loggers, metric tools, and monitoring services. Terraform integrates with these services using the specific provider to enable these specialized monitoring capabilities. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组监视和系统管理提供程序，它们提供了配置和管理服务的功能，例如记录器，度量工具和监视服务。Terraform使用特定的提供程序与这些服务集成，以启用这些专门的监视功能。这些提供程序主要由供应商与HashiCorp密切合作提供支持，并经过HashiCorp的测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of network providers that offer specific network capabilities such and DNS, routing, and firewall configuration. The providers generally offer a cloud-based service and Terraform integrates with these services using the specific providers. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组网络供应商,他们提供特定的网络功能,如DNS、路由和防火墙配置。这些提供商一般提供基于云的服务,Terraform使用特定的提供商与这些服务进行集成。这些提供商主要由厂商与HashiCorp紧密合作提供支持,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a group of software providers offering specialized infrastructure management capabilities such as configuration management. Terraform integrates with these tools using the specific providers to enable these specialized tools to execute tasks during the provisioning of infrastructure. These providers are primarily supported by the vendor in close collaboration with HashiCorp, and are tested by HashiCorp.
trans-unit.target: 这是一组软件供应商,提供专门的基础设施管理能力,如配置管理。Terraform使用特定的供应商与这些工具进行集成,使这些专业工具能够在基础设施的配置过程中执行任务。这些提供商主要由厂商与HashiCorp密切合作提供支持,并由HashiCorp进行测试。

trans-unit.source: This is a preferred approach over any other when running in EC2 as you can avoid hard coding credentials. Instead these are leased on-the-fly by Terraform which reduces the chance of leakage.
trans-unit.target: 当你在EC2中运行时,这是一种比其他任何方法都更可取的方法,因为你可以避免硬编码凭证。相反,这些证书是由Terraform即时租赁的,这减少了泄漏的机会。

trans-unit.source: This is a slightly-opinionated guide, which chooses to ignore the built-in versioning and staged deployment mechanisms in AWS Lambda and API Gateway. In many cases these features are not necessary when using Terraform because changes can be tracked and deployed by keeping the Terraform configuration in a version-control repository. It also uses API Gateway in a very simple way, proxying all requests to a single AWS Lambda function that is expected to contain its own request routing logic.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个略带观点的指南,它选择忽略AWS Lambda和API Gateway中内置的版本控制和分期部署机制。在很多情况下,在使用Terraform时,这些功能是不必要的,因为可以通过将Terraform配置保存在版本控制仓库中来跟踪和部署变化。它还以一种非常简单的方式使用API Gateway,将所有请求代理到一个AWS Lambda函数,预计该函数将包含自己的请求路由逻辑。
